  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="38351" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="38351" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.10</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="2139">2,139</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="199"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Luna</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a Floral fragrance for women and men. <b>Luna</b> was launched in 2016. Top notes are Lemon, Bergamot and Bitter Orange; middle notes are Rose, Juniper Berries and Jasmine; base notes are Balsam Fir, Musk and Ambergris. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Deutsch</a>,  <a     <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/news/en/21408/news.21408-120x120.jpg" alt="Perfumed Horoscope: November 4 - November 10" style="margin-right: 1em; flex-shrink: 0">    <div class="flex-child-auto">

            <span class="clickcatcher"></span><h4>Perfumed Horoscope: November 4 - November 10</h4>

            <span class="clickcatcher"></span><h4>Luna and Endymion: A Tale Told by Penhaligon&#039;s</h4>
        </a>
        <p>by <i>Alex (Sane-Witch) Osipov</i></p>
        <div class="right-bottom-corner-abs">            05/29/21 14:55
                    </div>
    </div>

    <span class="badge">9</span>
</div>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><longevity-rating :perfume_id="38351"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume longevity:<span>2.87</span> out of<span>5</span>.</p></longevity-rating></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><sillage-rating :perfume_id="38351"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume sillage:<span>1.99</span> out of<span>4</span>.</p></sillage-rating></div><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_4 -->

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2367632" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Valstrax"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2269989"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2269989.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Valstrax" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2367632ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2367632" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2269989">Valstrax</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-01"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733108777" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>imagine you are a magical girl from a mahou soujo anime. just after fighting villains and monsters, you are back in your academy doing mundane slice of life things like hanging out with your friends in a theme park. sparkly, and effervescent girl power granted by the moon and stars. this is what this smells like.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2367632"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2367632#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2364593" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2364593" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lovely sandra"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2273505"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2273505.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lovely sandra" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2364593ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2364593" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2273505">lovely sandra</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-28">11/28/24 22:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I can see why it’s called “Luna”. (My subjective opinion)<br />
In childhood I liked to go outside to the yard and watch the moon in the early-early morning, when you still can see the moon and feel the freshness of air and smell grass with dew on it, after a long refreshing night. So maybe you all are right, that this is indeed not a night scent. This is pure morning scent, when you still can see the moon and enjoy watching it, while smelling freshness of nature 🌙 <br />
I give it 8.5/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2364593"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2364593#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2358803" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2358803" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BernardtheSaint"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2321762"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BernardtheSaint" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2358803ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2358803" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2321762">BernardtheSaint</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-23">11/23/24 11:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>More of a female scent (very floral on the dry down), but has potential on the right guy. Longevity surprisingly good for an eau de toilet (I get 6-8h when sprayed on my shirt). The citrus + floral blent is very comforting. Not complex enough to justify the price however (100 euro/100ml).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2358803"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2358803#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2346062" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A great bright day to day fragrance, pretty simples but well executed</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2346062"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2346062#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2322801" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2249925">verymadz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-21">10/21/24 09:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells really soothing and relaxing, made me feel like I was at the spa.<br />
<br />
I can't imagine anyone disliking this, really. It's light, fresh, citrusy rose. <br />
<br />
The name surprised me - it's not what I'd assume for a moon fragrance. But it does make me want to put on a sheet mask and get into bed. It would be so perfect as a room mist...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2322801"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2322801#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2319978" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2319978" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rylai"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/67827"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.67827.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rylai" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/BDK-Parfums/Tabac-Rose-61838.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61838.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tabac Rose"title="Tabac Rose"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2319978ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2319978" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/67827">rylai</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-18">10/18/24 12:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very linear citrus scent. It's easy to guess, citrus at the beginning and white flower next to it and a musk at the end, I hit the nail on the head. It's a very, very simple scent. Its citrus lingered on my skin without ever fading.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2319978"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2319978#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2314338" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2314338" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jenaissequois"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1819864"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="jenaissequois" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/L-Eau-Papier-78658.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78658.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Eau Papier"title="L'Eau Papier"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2314338ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2314338" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1819864">jenaissequois</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-13">10/13/24 09:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this! I got it late spring one year and wore it most of that spring/summer. Because of that I don't know if it was the way I started wearing it or what but I feel like I can't/don't want to wear this scent in the winter. There's a coolness to the fragrance that is lovely in the warmer months but feels out of place in the winter. I so love the juniper notes though! Would definitely recommend if you're not a fan of really heavy florals.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2314338"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2314338#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2306668" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2306668" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dillinger"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/431636"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dillinger" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2306668ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2306668" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/431636">Dillinger</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-06">10/06/24 07:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I adore this. The main scents I get are of rose and lemon, which give me a ‘Turkish delight’ vibe and I have always loved that as a combination. Reminds me of a lovely Lush bath ballistic, I can’t recall the name. To me this smells slightly sweet from the rose, a slight musk and a lemon that sharpens it a touch to stop it becoming too faint/mild. I spray this and I am happy :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2306668"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2306668#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2305104" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2305104" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nikkoblue"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/940152"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nikkoblue" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Hermessence-Vanille-Galante-5213.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5213.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hermessence Vanille Galante"title="Hermessence Vanille Galante"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2305104ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2305104" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/940152">Nikkoblue</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-04">10/04/24 16:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On a tester strip I liked it. But on skin I don’t.  There’s a note in here that I’ve encountered before in other penhaligons scents, like a generic slightly masculine musk.  Combines with the juniper and citrus it ends up smelling like a drugstore mens body wash on me.  It’s not going to bother anyone but I can’t imagine myself feeling comfortable with this scent for more than a few hours.  Pass.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2305104"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2305104#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2303269" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's a beautiful scent but for me it's far too sweet to be worn in hot weather. The florals are very strong and there's delicate citrus in there but it's got an intoxicating sweetness, almost stickiness, that makes it more suitable for cooler days in my view.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2289707" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Liveche"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/993164"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.993164.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Liveche" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermetica/Rosefire-52022.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52022.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rosefire"title="Rosefire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2289707ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2289707" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2262490" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PlushPetals"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2234244"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2234244.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PlushPetals" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2262490ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2262490" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2234244">PlushPetals</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-27">08/27/24 07:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wear this every day in the warmer weather. It smells like bright citrus dancing with jasmine all wrapped in a soft musky sweetness. It feels both mature and playful, and I couldn't recommend it more.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2262490"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2262490#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2258497" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2258497" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sophiasnoseknows"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1765715"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="sophiasnoseknows" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2258497ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2258497" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1765715">sophiasnoseknows</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-23">08/23/24 10:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Like a luxurious hotel hand cream. The citrus is clean, balanced, and clear in the opening, the bitter orange and fir add sophistication, while the florals and musk keep it classic and wearable. It does have a slightly cold and prim energy, but this plays well with the image it casts of a well put together and timeless woman. It's fresh, unchallenging, and bright while still maintaining the self confident core of a clearly high end perfume. I find the longevity and sillage moderate and although I wouldn't personally reach for this fragrance, I can see it as being the perfect signature scent for the right person.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2258497"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2258497#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2255987" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2255987" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hanniii"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2213984"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="hanniii" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2255987ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2255987" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2213984">hanniii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-21">08/21/24 03:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells old. I don’t like it. The worst blind buy ever. I will not purchase this again.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2255987"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2255987#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2251285" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2251285" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ajlis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2074474"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2074474.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ajlis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/The-Noir-29-31872.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31872.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Noir 29"title="The Noir 29"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2251285ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2251285" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2074474">Ajlis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-16">08/16/24 09:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is ”quiet luxury” in a bottle. If you're looking for a fresh and clean but elegant fragrance to use for the rest of your life, look no further. This perfume would suit both a 20-year-old and an 80-year-old equally well. In a way, there's nothing particularly fancy about Luna – it's simply a clean citrus-floral scent. However, it has softness and sweetness to it that sets it apart from other "freshies”. Luna stands out, especially for its quality. It's light as a dream, floaty and airy, without resorting to the trend of molecular fragrances. All its components are in perfect balance. Luna is timeless and classy, extremely easy to wear. I don't think it could irritate or disturb anyone. It sits close to the skin but lasts about five to six hours, which is excellent performance for a clean and light fragrance like this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2251285"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2251285#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2248824" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2248824" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Enrium"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36833"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.36833.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Enrium" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Glossier/You-46885.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46885.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="You"title="You"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2248824ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2248824" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36833">Enrium</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-14">08/14/24 07:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Luna is an inoffensive freshie, designed with mass appeal in mind. Its bright, effervescent citrus opening is as pleasant as it is generic, and the musky florals are predictable. It is undeniably good quality, but feels lacklustre and not evocative of its name, being a sunny daytime scent.<br />
<br />
Luna opens with fresh citrus, with lemon most evident to my nose. The lemon is neither candied nor toilet cleaner-like - it is simply bright and sheer. The rose follows after a little while, light and dewy, marrying nicely with the citrus. There is an aromatic green undertone, pine-like to my nose, complementing the rose nicely. <br />
<br />
Clean jasmine becomes dominant as it develops, eclipsing the rose (punny) and lingering for the second act alongside the green notes. It becomes cleanly musky as it fades, the jasmine remaining until final fade. Sillage and longevity are moderate. It is feminine-leaning, given the prominent sweet florals, and is a daytime spring/summer scent.<br />
<br />
Pleasant but nothing special, Luna is a light, discreet citrus-floral freshie, nicely-composed but nothing exciting. Definitely overpriced. 3/5.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2248824"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2248824#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2244963" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2244963" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JulianaMP"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1743116"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1743116.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JulianaMP" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2244963ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2244963" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1743116">JulianaMP</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-10">08/10/24 10:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I first smelled this in the form of a sample-sized facial mist from a Singapore Airlines business class toiletry kit. The fact that it was in there tells us a few things about it. First, any scent that a luxury airline choses for this purpose has to be generic enough to appeal to the majority of its passengers. Second, it also has to give off a luxe appeal, because its clientele generally would demand as much (not me, though, I’m just happy to be here). Third, who flies business class? Generally - though of course, not exclusively - people 30+.<br />
<br />
It’s not a surprise, then, that Luna fits these parameters exactly. It’s generic enough that most people wouldn’t be put off by it or find it especially interesting (at least to the point of distraction), yet it makes you think “this is a special smell that not just anyone knows about,” a consideration that goes hand-in-hand with luxury.<br />
<br />
I’ve seen a few reviews calling it youthful, but to me, the rose element is way too heavy for that, and I just can’t imagine it on someone who doesn’t have their life somewhat together. If it’s playful, like others have said, the play is strictly organized and decidedly adult; it’s the first day of a thoroughly-planned international vacation, breakfast at 8 AM sharp, followed by a ticketed museum experience (reservations made months in advance), a “nap or stretch break” scheduled into the day. It’s not whimsical or carefree.<br />
<br />
Also, I agree with other reviewers that this scent is similar to Diptyque’s L’ombre Dans L’Eau. If you like that perfume but find it slightly too dark or serious, this is a good alternative.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2244963"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2244963#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2239526" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2230852"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2230852#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2218026" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2209990" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hgf2008"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2032817"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hgf2008" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2209990ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2209990" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2032817">Hgf2008</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-06">07/06/24 09:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The loveliest lemon sherbet scent - soft, fresh and uplifting but still sweet enough to entice. It doesn't stick around for long but delightful while it's there.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2209990"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2209990#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2202180" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2202180" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LuckiestCat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2160071"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2160071.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LuckiestCat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38351.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna"title="Luna"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2202180ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2202180" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2160071">LuckiestCat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-28">06/28/24 11:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wasn't impressed by this on paper, but sprayed on my skin it smells like a lovely refreshing floral citrus punch, juicy and a little tart. It's not lemon-forward (which is good because I hate lemon scents). If I had to choose, I would say mandarin. It gives a sweet rose and citrus impression, and dries down to rose. Light, airy, clean, young, optimistic. Great for hot weather.  A surprising favorite!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2202180"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2202180#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2200585" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2200585" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WitchQueen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1735970"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="WitchQueen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2200585ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2200585" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); Skin scent, like nose to skin after 1 hour. It's okay. I tried this in 90* and 70* F weather. I won't finish my 2ml sample but will give it to my sister or friend.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2200585"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2200585#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2197053" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2197053" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="thehanna"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/48861"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.48861.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="thehanna" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Liaisons-Dangereuses-4321.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4321.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Liaisons Dangereuses"title="Liaisons Dangereuses"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2197053ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2197053" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/48861">thehanna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-23">06/23/24 06:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nondescript in cooler weather, this fragrance really need s a hot day to come alive. Fir, juniper and lemon give a green freshness and soapy roses add a clean skin smell. Lasts much longer than the usual disappearing summer citrus. No sandalwood or other woodiness to make it oppressive in summer. I really dismissed this the first time I wore it but loved it when I smelled again during a heat wave.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2197053"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2197053#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2197010" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2197010" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Somnambulant Madame Mau"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2170646"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2170646.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Somnambulant Madame Mau" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2197010ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2197010" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2170646">Somnambulant Madame Mau</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-23">06/23/24 06:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not what I was expecting, it's fresh, feminine and pretty with citrusy notes that remind me of Elizabeth Arden's Green Tea. I was pleasantly surprised by the longevity given it's only an EDT, it lasted about 6 hours on my skin. Will definitely be purchasing a full sized bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2197010"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2197010#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2195897" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2189769" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Saveria"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1847747"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1847747.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Saveria" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Addict-Eau-de-Parfum-2014-28201.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28201.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Addict Eau de Parfum (2014)"title="Dior Addict Eau de Parfum (2014)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2189769ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2189769" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1847747">Saveria</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-16">06/16/24 03:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Luna is a very sweet and fresh fragrance.<br />
<br />
It smells mainly of rose and jasmine with a little hint of citrus, it's very delicate. I didn't find anything spicy in it.<br />
<br />
A nice perfume but nothing extraordinary, with a very intimate staying power and non-existent sillage. After one to two hours, there is nothing left.<br />
<br />
A little expensive for the performance and scent offered.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2189769"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2189769#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2184716" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2182559" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vminie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2128906"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="vminie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2182559ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2182559" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2128906">vminie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-08">06/08/24 21:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Floral citrusy opening for me which was promising but then dry down was this musk that is kind of floral, sweet and salty? Someone described it as walking in a flower garden after a shower and I do sense this because it has this grass-like scent on the dry-down (at least, on me). I do sense that I might need to try this perfume again in the colder months because it's not working for me this hot steamy weather</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2182111" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marta_Regina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1934803"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1934803.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marta_Regina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2182111ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2182111" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); A soothing aroma, perfect for a joyful, clean refreshment. However, the projection and sillage are closer to the ethereality of moonlight. They are like a distant and mystical reflection, pale and beautiful, but only a reflection of the true scent. Ephemeral.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2182111"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2182111#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2172092" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2172092" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pocketfullofposies"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1479013"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1479013.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pocketfullofposies" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2172092ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2172092" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); Starts with a burst of citrus and dries down to a scent reminiscent of lemon sweets. Quite a youthful and girly perfume for someone who isn’t a fan of the typical candy fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2172092"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2172092#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2158261" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2158261" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="xeina89"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1744043"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1744043.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="xeina89" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2158261ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2158261" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1744043">xeina89</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-16">05/16/24 13:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>ريحة حلوة كتير، ناعمة و بنفس الوقت جريئة<br />
عطر انثوي سيترسي فريش<br />
نوتة العرعر او juniper فيه فخمة جداً<br />
<br />
افتتاحية العطر بتتكون من الليمون و البرغموت مع البرتقال المر<br />
<br />
قلب العطر مزيج رااااائع من الورد و العرعر مع الياسمين<br />
<br />
قاعدة العطر عنبرية مسكية بلسمية<br />
<br />
عطر فااااااخر جداً و من احلى عطور الربيع و الصيف 😍 <br />
follow me @by.zeinaa</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2158261"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2158261#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2155684" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2155684" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="catinfroghat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2068023"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2068023.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="catinfroghat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2155684ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2155684" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2068023">catinfroghat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-14">05/14/24 09:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Starts off bright and optimistic, reminds me of walking through a citrus grove in the summer. Then mellows down into a delicate floral scent which could best be described as a rose garden after a light shower. Very innocent, soft, gorgeous vibes. I can imagine a fairytale princess smelling like this. I wish it suited me better because this is a really beautiful scent. The performance is impressive too considering how light the fragrance is.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2155684"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2155684#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2138104" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2138104" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TyDay"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242968"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1242968.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TyDay" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/D-G-Anthology-L-Imperatrice-3-6086.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6086.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="D&G Anthology L'Imperatrice 3"title="D&G Anthology L'Imperatrice 3"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2138104ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2138104" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242968">TyDay</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-27">04/27/24 10:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a lovely fragrance, it’s just not for me. To me,  the citrus notes, fir, rose and berries stand out the most on my skin. This perfume low-key reminds me of cleaning products (and maybe the urinal cakes a bit 😅 but strangely not in a bad way ) and soap (mostly soap smell). It leans more feminine, and has a slight sweetness to it, but it’s unisex in my opinion. If you’re looking for a clean, soapy fragrance, you’ll find it with Luna.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2138104"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2138104#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2121863" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2121863" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stringstheory"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2066812"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2066812.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stringstheory" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kat-Von-D/Saint-6701.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6701.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Saint"title="Saint"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2121863ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2121863" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2066812">stringstheory</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-11">04/11/24 17:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i can't tell if i like this or am just deeply intrigued by it. oddly enough i get almost no citrus notes on my skin - it's more like someone whispered the word "lemon" into the bottle as they sealed it. instead it plunges straight down into earthy rose and fir trees; like wet dirt and decay but not exactly repulsive. wearing this would be more weather specific to me, i'm from the pacific northwest of the USA and see it making sense to wear in any season so long as it was stereotypically damp and gray outside.<br />
<br />
a very photorealistic scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2121863"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2121863#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2116140" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
