Very heavy on the citrus, which hung around on my skin a bit longer than I would have liked. Also think the juniber berries stuck around a bit too long as well. <br />
<br />
Not for me. Would have liked the Rose and Jasmine to stand out a bit more (or even come out!)  <br />
<br />
Odd scent to describe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2116140"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2116140#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2115332" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2115332" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chesf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1903937"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1903937.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chesf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Goldfield-Banks-Australia/Bohemian-Lime-60923.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60923.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bohemian Lime"title="Bohemian Lime"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2115332ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2115332" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1903937">Chesf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-05">04/05/24 11:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Luna is such an unusual and distinct smell that I have write about it cuz it makes me think.  It feels like a fragrance not fit in our reality world but in a fictional or cartoon 2D world, maybe willi wonka chocolate factory.   It describes a girl who is weird, mute, and mischievous. White hair, white pupils, white dress, to white ballad shoes, she chews all day and blows bubble out of soft yellow, green, pink and purple candies, Such memorable personality.  She's quite an outcast, a rebel, you see. She's just standing there, crossed-legged, arm-crossed and aloof, not looking at you, not paying attention to anybody. <br />
<br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2115332"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2115332#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2106880" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2106880" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Isabella Therese"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1337526"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1337526.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Isabella Therese" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Houbigant/Ambre-Rubis-97383.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.97383.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ambre Rubis"title="Ambre Rubis"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2106880ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2106880" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1337526">Isabella Therese</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-28">03/28/24 07:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Luna is one of my fantasy fragrances. I'm a big fan of The Lord of the Rings (books and movies alike) and I blind bought Luna because someone said it made her think of the wood elves from LOTR. I agree. It smells like a wood elf who's walking around in the moonlight (and starlight) in an enchanted forest, specifically fir forest, surrounded by lemon juice. The fir and citrus are dominant, but I also get a slight floral note. There's almost no sweetness here. It's very refreshing, cooling and bright. I wear Luna everytime i watch LOTR now, so it really is a fantasy scent to me. Sometimes I also wear it on really hot summer days since it's so refreshing. It's not the most amazing scent ever, but it makes me happy. It projects pretty well but doesn't have the best longevity, it lasts about 4-5 hours on my skin. 8/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2106880"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2106880#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2094481" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2094481" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="daffodilsandcoffee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1438987"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1438987.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="daffodilsandcoffee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38351.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna"title="Luna"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2094481ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2094481" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1438987">daffodilsandcoffee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-16">03/16/24 11:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This makes my nose hairs dance. The juniper and fir keeps it from going into generic rose-citrus-freshie territory. It feels like being in a garden at night. It's not a long lasting fragrance, kind of like the moon coming in and out of the clouds. If I didn't own Eau Rose by Diptyque, I'd consider a full bottle. Definitely suits hot weather. It's delightful every time I spray it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2094481"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2094481#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2087087" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2087087" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Aidafares"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1357253"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1357253.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Aidafares" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2087087ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2087087" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1357253">Aidafares</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-09">03/09/24 08:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Luna Penhaligon's <br />
جايه اكلمكم عن اول برفيوم اجيب منه ازازه تانيه بعد ما خلصت الاولي منه <br />
جايه اكلمكم عن البرفيوم الخلصته في شهرين في عز الصيف و الرطوبه مكنتش بشيل الازازه من شنطه ايدي <br />
البرفيوم ده من الصعب وصفه بس هحاول <br />
اول صفه ريحته جميله تدل علي جمال <br />
ريحته بريئه اه والله تحس بالبرا ه بس مَش براءه الاطفال <br />
تحس ببرائه اللانثي في جدا <br />
عارفين لما تشوفه ست جميله جدا و لسه واخده شاور و شعرها مبلول بس متسرح و لابسه فستان كتان ابيض فلافي و جسمهاو بشرتها كلها بتلمع و تحس ان وشها مشمس هي ريحتها بتبقي عامله كده هي ريحتها بتبقي لونا <br />
اجي التفاصيل <br />
البرفيوم في نوتات ستريس تمام بس مَش شارب very smooth و بعدين بتشم ريحه نوتات خضرا بس مَش المتعارف عليها خضرا من نوع تاني خالص خضرا ناعمه <br />
نوتات الروز و الفواكه من نوع البيري بس اي واحده معرفش بس اعتقد البلو بيري او توت الازرق حاجه شبهه كده متساوين و ممزوجين مع بعض بتساوي عاملين مكس غريب و جديد تمام و طبعا من الميد و لحد دراي يظهر العنبر جري مع المسك بنعومه شديده جدا و البرفيوم علي بعضه تحس انه مائي بس مَش اكواتك بحري لا اكواتك من نوع الحلو مَش المالح <br />
 فعلا تحس انك حاطت نيش برفيوم بس في نفس الوقت ناعم و يعني السهل الممتنع</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2087087"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2087087#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2076895" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2076895" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="smellysmellz83"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2012408"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="smellysmellz83" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2076895ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2076895" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2012408">smellysmellz83</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-28">02/28/24 10:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume feels very simple and elegant. It reminds me of what a little girl thinks of when she imagines perfume. I smell citrus at first, then it dries down into a rose perfume with a slight hit of aquatics and a molecule musk base. As someone who is not a rose fan, I’m glad to have smelled it, but I don’t see myself wearing it. I can see why this would be attractive to those who like rose, though. It’s definitely in the EDT category. Give it three hours, and you won’t be sure that you’ve put on any fragrance at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2076895"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2076895#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2076836" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2076836" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="natashaandika"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2000000"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="natashaandika" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2076836ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2076836" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2000000">natashaandika</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-28">02/28/24 09:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Luna is adverstised as a fragrance that portrays the 'Moon Goddess, soothing and seductive' (penhaligon's website). I immediately blind bought the full bottle, but alas, upon sniffing it, I don't really get either. It is very bright--that's for sure--but I wish it was a bit more aromatic. Its very a pretty scent, but I wouldn't say this is soothing, nor seductive. Although I was underwhelmed, it is lovely if you are looking for a clean and innocent perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2076836"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2076836#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2075692" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2075692" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="goddessoftheforest"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2034027"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="goddessoftheforest" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2075692ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2075692" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2034027">goddessoftheforest</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-27">02/27/24 08:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The combination of citrus and rose, and perhaps the woody notes, come together to make something fresh and bright but also quite sweet. It’s bright in a lemon candy kind of way, but it’s not that sweet. It is not particularly sharp despite having a lot of citrus. It’s very well blended and has a smooth and fresh effect. The silage is moderate but the longevity is surprisingly short. It really disappeared on me after a couple hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2075692"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2075692#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2071153" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I love it so much! It's just classy, elegant, fresh, and clean. It's my favorite of all time!<br />
i love wearing in summer</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2065513"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2065513#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2063033" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2063033" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aatkins"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1914946"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="aatkins" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Vilhelm-Parfumerie/Morning-Chess-30930.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30930.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Morning Chess"title="Morning Chess"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2063033ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2063033" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1914946">aatkins</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-15">02/15/24 07:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>While objectively I wouldn't classify this as a winter scent, it smells EXACTLY like my memories of making hard candy at Christmastime when I was a kid. I’m talking boiling corn syrup on the stove and adding little drams of lemon and orange flavoring while one of those balsam&amp;cedar candles is lit in the other room. My favorite from Penhaligons</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2063033"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2063033#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2051421" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2051421" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mata-ratos"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1711237"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1711237.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mata-ratos" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Escentric-Molecules/Molecule-01-845.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.845.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Molecule 01"title="Molecule 01"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2051421ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2051421" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1711237">Mata-ratos</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-03">02/03/24 18:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful clean, soft, citrusy, aquatic, rose. Honestly I think I might want this to be my wedding perfume. This is one of the prettiest perfumes I have ever smelled. It’s gorgeous and light and beautiful and radiant. My bf said it smells“oceany.” “I like it. It’s fresh.” <br />
<br />
The only problem with this scent is (at least on my skin) it doesn’t project very much and it doesn’t last very long. The first 30mins there’s some decent projection, but then it quickly fades into a skin scent that lasts only about 2-3 hours on me and then it completely disappears :/ for such an expensive fragrance it should last a little bit longer<br />
<br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2051421"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2051421#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2038035" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2038035" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Projectcensor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1660881"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1660881.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Projectcensor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2038035ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2038035" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1660881">Projectcensor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-21">01/21/24 21:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Luna is bright, mostly clean, not modest at all. <br />
<br />
It reminds me of the colours orange and cream. Also of slightly obnoxious rich women, (all the penhaligan’s scents I have tried smell like snobbery to me) <br />
<br />
It has similarities to ELDO’s - I Am Trash in the kinda rotten fruit, compost bin edge it has.<br />
<br />
It also transports me to those local clothing boutiques in Spain that pump the stores with heavy, fruity, alcoholic air fresheners or floor cleaners which draw you in at first but very quickly turn sour and clawing to the inside of your nose the more you walk around and as the heat gets the better of you. <br />
<br />
It can become a little headachy too if you’re sensitive to that, which is interesting considering it’s not even a strong or well performing perfume. <br />
<br />
 5.9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2038035"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2038035#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2035328" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2035328" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="octobersun"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/9879"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.9879.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="octobersun" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bvlgari/Bvlgari-Pour-Femme-142.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.142.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bvlgari Pour Femme"title="Bvlgari Pour Femme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2035328ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2035328" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/9879">octobersun</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-19">01/19/24 02:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this very, very pretty, surprisingly sweet and really tasteful Turkish delight rose in the heart of the fragrance and aromatic driedown. <br />
I don't find much resanblance with L' Ombre Dans which I love too, but I find different, dark vibe in it.  Luna is brighter, sweeter, more feminine to me and the rose in it is a kind of edible.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2035328"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2035328#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2034807" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369758">Controlledbyscent31</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-18">01/18/24 12:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Went into this sample blind... <br />
It's a no from me, she is Green and I realise just how much I cannot stand juniper on my skin 🤢 it's so screechy <br />
If your after a super citrus rose with no sweetness she's your girl, it smells to me like a drink... <br />
Bubbly, sparkling gin (the juniper) with rose petals and lemon in the drink topped with tonic I am such a gourmand and heavy oud/rose lover that this is just like the total opposite of what I like personally.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2032902" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jiaamin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1762388"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1762388.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jiaamin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2032902ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2032902" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1762388">jiaamin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-16">01/16/24 15:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very bright and clean perfume, perfect for summer! Safe blind buy though, not offensive at all. Opening smells a bit like lush citrus bath bombs, I smell more lemon/begamot compared to orange, with a hint of soft rose (reminds me a little of the marmalade jo malone). Then fades to a sweet musc-y floral, with a slight freshness. Probably wouldn’t repurchase though because it is too citrusy for my liking.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2032902"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2032902#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2026614" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2026614" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jj000777"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1302612"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1302612.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jj000777" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Matcha-Meditation-64805.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64805.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Matcha Meditation"title="Matcha Meditation"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2026614ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2026614" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1302612">jj000777</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-10">01/10/24 10:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think this is my new signature scent (sorry wallet). The bitter orange takes this scent to a photorealistic smell of sticking your thumb in an orange and prying it open - that moment when the zest spritzes into the air. It is backed by the softest rose and an air of light, piney greenery that somehow doesn’t take the stage. <br />
<br />
It’s fresh, cute, pretty, but with a classic maturity. Im totally in love. The gift set was the best blind buy of my life! Now what to do with this tiny soap..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2026614"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2026614#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2023496" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2023496" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cookygirl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/874574"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="cookygirl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/Idole-Aura-67578.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67578.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Idôle Aura"title="Idôle Aura"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2023496ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2023496" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/874574">cookygirl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-07">01/07/24 10:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful rosey, orangey scent.<br />
The orange note here is incredibly photo realistic in the opening. <br />
Later it mellows and loses some of its zestiness <br />
Really all I smell here is rose + orange + musk, but it's no less lovely for that.<br />
Update - I was just gifted a mini of this lovely scent. I am so excited to wear it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2023496"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2023496#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2017099" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2017099" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Celia0506"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1836589"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1836589.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Celia0506" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38351.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna"title="Luna"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2017099ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2017099" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1836589">Celia0506</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-01">01/01/24 13:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the perfume that made me question my entire taste. I usually don't like citruses and white flowers. I'm more of an amber girlie, I love oud, muscs, spices.. <br />
<br />
But this perfume. It's so bubbly and innocent. Pure, soft, clean. It smells like girlhood, love, life, taking a midnight bath alone while talking to the moon... It made me reconnect to myself with so much depth. I feel healed, it's just me in a bottle. <br />
<br />
Oh to have all I ever wanted to be and all I that I ever will be in a bottle...<br />
<br />
On a more serious note, longevity and projection are amazing on me for an EDT. But I wouldn't mind it to be a skin scent, as I feel weirdly intimate with this perfume. <br />
There's a subtle synthetic note to this perfume, and the clean musc goes amazingly well with it : I feel like I have been forced to meticulously clean myself to appear as fresh and young and conventionally attractive as I can. I am plastic, it's fantastic, but I'm also the moon's daughter and I fucking will swim in a pond and get all muddy to talk to her. Again, WTF Penhaligon's, I just wanted to smell nice.<br />
<br />
(This perfume did a better job than any therapist I ever talked to)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2017099"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2017099#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2008457" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2008457"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2008457#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1994068" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1994068" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bleuetfane"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1738697"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1738697.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bleuetfane" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1994068ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1994068" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1738697">bleuetfane</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-06">12/06/23 10:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really wanted to love this one, but my skin picks up only the orange, and maybe some of the juniper berry. Bitter, cold, and sour, not unpleasant but also nothing I’d choose over some other scents in my collection. Quite inoffensive and subtle, and nice for a snowy day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1994068"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1994068#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1988803" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1988803" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Endi1geida"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1418761"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1418761.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Endi1geida" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1988803ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1988803" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1418761">Endi1geida</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-30">11/30/23 05:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opens lemon-citrusy, with an after-scent of rose. Then it settles into a more clean rose-y scent that is corpous, not too heavy, not too light. After some hours it settles into a rose-musky-ambroxan scent that reminds me Not a perfume by Juliette has a gun, but with a more powdery and strong feature. <br />
<br />
I really like how this perfume evolves, it is like having different scents at different times of the day. Sillage is intimate though, very good for people prone to headaches and maybe not for who wants to be noticed and stand out. However, I could still smell this on my wrist the morning after I wore it, even though it had faded quite a bit, which surprised me given how soft and light this perfume is. <br />
<br />
I really like it. 8.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1988803"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1988803#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1988049" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1988049" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hillamanne"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1907414"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1907414.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hillamanne" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Matiere-Premiere/Vanilla-Powder-84933.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84933.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla Powder"title="Vanilla Powder"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1988049ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1988049" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1907414">hillamanne</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-29">11/29/23 07:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opens with a slightly pungent cleaning product vibe but softens up quickly. Elegant cool florals with fresh citrus. The rose isn't very pronounced for me in the beginning, but comes out a bit more after the citruses tone down. A little soapy and powdery. Fresh clean sheets. Understated and more feminine-leaning. Could be an everyday scent. It's nice and inoffensive, but it doesn't have a wow-factor. A bit too simple for me, but probably a safe choice for someone who doesn't wear a lot of perfume or doesn't want to offend. Not very long lasting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1988049"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1988049#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1956628" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1956628" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FilipeD"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1781169"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1781169.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FilipeD" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Kredo-74670.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74670.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kredo"title="Kredo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1956628ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1956628" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1781169">FilipeD</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-20">10/20/23 06:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's an ok scent, citric opening that quickly vanishes leaving a feminine synthetic rose, but a guy can pull it off easily.<br />
Reminds me of a lighter version of a cross between Jo Malone's Peony and blush suede with Hermès Un Jardin a Cythere.<br />
Understated, could be an everyday dayware scent for a lot of people.<br />
It's easy to comprehend but it does not want to be more than it is: a scent for sensitive noses who dislike strong perfumery.<br />
If you love the rose in it, but want to pump it up a few notches, try Radical Rose by Matiere Premiere instead.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1956628"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1956628#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1955846" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Hard pass</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1955846"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1955846#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1953016" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1953016" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Imyourheiress"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1401205"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1401205.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Imyourheiress" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38351.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna"title="Luna"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1953016ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1953016" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); My signature scent and also the scent i choose on special occasion. Absolute favorite! This is the only perfume i bought a back up bottle in my collection at the moment. I wonder if they will ever make an edp of this? But this already last long on my skin being an edt. LOVE!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1953016"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1953016#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1946334" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1946334" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="erinisakim"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1858307"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="erinisakim" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1946334ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1946334" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1858307">erinisakim</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-07">10/07/23 09:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My absolute favorite scent, I keep coming back to it even thought it makes me sneeze. The opening reminds me of sucking on an artificial lemon-flavored candy, and then it opens up into a soapy rose scent with a little note of pine. I’m not usually into overly floral scents, but the hint of earthiness makes it really addictive.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1946334"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1946334#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1937492" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1937492" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="auror"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/164080"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.164080.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="auror" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1937492ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1937492" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/164080">auror</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-26">09/26/23 00:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lovely fresh light floral scent. Citrusy opening and rosy drydown. Rose here is very fresh and actually pretty similar to L’ombre Dans L’eau. Diptyque one is more green and it feels like a walk in the forest. Luna is more like a walk in a small garden with flowers rather than a forest. Would be very nice in warmer weathers.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1937492"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1937492#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1936510" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1936510" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sandra_101"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1674985"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1674985.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sandra_101" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frederic-Malle/Carnal-Flower-1024.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1024.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Carnal Flower"title="Carnal Flower"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1936510ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1936510" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1674985">sandra_101</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-24">09/24/23 18:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Luna is a lovely lemony-savory rose fragrance that is so fleeting. As others have said, the vegetal rose accord is definitely reminiscent of Diptyque's L'Ombre Dans L'Eau (both edt and edp) but the comparison stops there because Luna doesn't have those blackcurrant nettles. <br />
<br />
What it actually smells a lot more like to me is Diptyque's Eau Rose. So, if you like Luna but want better longevity, check that one out!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1936510"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1936510#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1930890" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1930890" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MissPetunia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1841107"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="MissPetunia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1930890ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1930890" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1841107">MissPetunia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-18">09/18/23 07:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The perfume opens up very nicely, although I can’t really say that I detect any citrus notes. Then after a couple of minutes all I can smell is rose with just a tiny hint of juniper. I don’t like how it reacts on my skin type, the rose scent is too dominating. It does smell expensive though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1930890"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1930890#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1927922" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1927922" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="COLOREDGIRLSHUFFLE"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341923"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1341923.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="COLOREDGIRLSHUFFLE" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rochas/Eau-de-Rochas-2361.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2361.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau de Rochas"title="Eau de Rochas"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1927922ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1927922" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341923">COLOREDGIRLSHUFFLE</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-14">09/14/23 12:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Another Penhaligon I adore! I swear each fragrance I love by the perfumer is so delightfully different than the other.  For me this opens up as a grapefruity blast- I am guessing it's the bergamot and bitter orange...and then quickly, as a previous commenter said, settles on its beautiful rose heart.  The rose smells like Egyptian attars, more like a perfumed oil than a spray.  I think this quality makes the rose more appealing as it absorbs the citrus top notes, melding and overpowering the citrus while still allowing the citrus to peek its head out here and there. The balsam fir and musk base keep the rose front and center but it adds an earthier tone.  This is so far out of my normal range but I love this. I think the rose would be too much for hotter months, but it is definitely a late spring and early fall scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1927922"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1927922#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1920580" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Smells just like a milder version of Atelier Clementine California.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1920580"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1920580#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1919601" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
