padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1918336" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cloudynight"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1829411"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1829411.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cloudynight" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Solstice-Scents/Foxcroft-Fairgrounds-36792.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.36792.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Foxcroft Fairgrounds"title="Foxcroft Fairgrounds"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1918336ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1918336" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1829411">cloudynight</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-02">09/02/23 20:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells so beautiful but way overpriced due to lack of sillage and longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1918336"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1918336#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1917726" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1917726" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="missfit"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/47631"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="missfit" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Bamboo-Harmony-14330.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.14330.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bamboo Harmony"title="Bamboo Harmony"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1917726ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1917726" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/47631">missfit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-02">09/02/23 06:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bright, citrus-y, and sort of simple, but not in a bad way. I seldom use an entire bottle of anything, but I purchased this at Penhaligon's in London and fell in love. It is very citrus-forward with a little rose under that—the other notes really seem to be there just to ground this. This is a bright, happy spring-summer scent that just smells clean. It smells nearly identical to Goutal's Eau d'Hadrien. There are probably different middle notes that distinguish them, but the top notes and dry down feel remarkably similar.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1917726"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1917726#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1915400" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1915400" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nougasaur"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1557466"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1557466.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nougasaur" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38351.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna"title="Luna"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1915400ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1915400" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1557466">Nougasaur</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-30">08/30/23 11:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I truly don't understand how anyone is getting citrus or anything other than rose. To me, this smells like a nice, old, expensive rose soap. It conjures up images of the bathrooms of elegant old ladies, where there would be a basket of old hardened soaps shaped as sea shells and flowers. It's not terrible as rose scents go, but it's not something I will finish or buy again.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1915400"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1915400#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1914419" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1914419" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="violeteme"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387189"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1387189.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="violeteme" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sisley/Sisley-Eau-de-3-5852.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5852.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sisley Eau de 3"title="Sisley Eau de 3"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1914419ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1914419" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387189">violeteme</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-29">08/29/23 09:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love the name and the bottle, the fragrance truly resembles L'Ombre Dans L'Eau EDT, just a softer version. I must agree with cleaning spray comparisons, some note makes it smell like random cleaning supplies. I have ambivalent feelings on this. I like L'Ombre Dans EDP version more, but Luna could sparkle much more in hot weather.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1914419"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1914419#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1912060" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1912060" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="junidasom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733670"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1733670.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="junidasom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Miss-Dior-Blooming-Bouquet-2023-78945.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78945.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet (2023)"title="Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet (2023)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1912060ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1912060" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733670">junidasom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-26">08/26/23 10:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is very citrusy and later I can sense the juniper berries and crisp fir. This fragrance is not like Delina at all. I don't understand why it was listed under this fragrance also smells like. This perfume is definitely not a gourmand like Indult manakara or Delina. It's not very youthful and sweet so I would say the age range for this fragrance would be for those that are feminine around their late 20s to early 30s. I would say this is a ever so sweet and citrusy version of diptyque's Orpheon..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1912060"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1912060#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1908594" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1908594" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Smeraldina77"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1613700"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Smeraldina77" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Magenta-Tanzanite-71536.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71536.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Magenta Tanzanite"title="Magenta Tanzanite"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1908594ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1908594" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1613700">Smeraldina77</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-22">08/22/23 08:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Now, the bottle is super cute, the name is lovely, although, from a fragrance called Luna (Moon) I would have expected some more nocturnal quality. To me this scent is very fresh, I smell the rose and the citrus the most. I was expecting to smell more juniper and fir, but they are totally non-existent to my nose. In general, I find it quite pleasant, even if not remarkable. I do not care much about sillage, but, unfortunately, on my skin lasted just a couple of hours, so, because of this and the lack of originality I do not think I will buy it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1908594"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1908594#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1907844" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1907844" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lykopa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1492443"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1492443.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lykopa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Acqua-di-Parma/Acqua-di-Parma-Blu-Mediterraneo-Fico-di-Amalfi-1687.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1687.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Parma Blu Mediterraneo - Fico di Amalfi"title="Acqua di Parma Blu Mediterraneo - Fico di Amalfi"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1907844ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1907844" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1492443">Lykopa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-21">08/21/23 12:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Gorgeous, soft, ethereal. Like bathing in sweet milk with drops of lemon oil and rose. Reminds me of moonlight and womanhood.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1907844"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1907844#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1907593" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1907593" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sbg9s"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1470622"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sbg9s" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1907593ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1907593" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1470622">Sbg9s</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-21">08/21/23 06:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a sample of this and it smells really good and fresh, but I have several perfumes for a more reasonable price that it reminds me of. Specifically Red Roses by Jo Malone. <br />
Luna mostly smells like dewy rose to me. It's not identical to Jo Malone's but they are too similar for me to want this. Longevity of this was not that bad, I was expecting worse from the reviews, but Jo Malone's is still much longer lasting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1907593"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1907593#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1906303" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1906303" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="msilk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1504784"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1504784.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="msilk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1906303ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1906303" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1504784">msilk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-19">08/19/23 12:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The only thing I hate about this perfume is the lemon note. It makes the opening smell like some sort of cleaning spray and it is way too overpowering. There's enough more subtle citruses in this composition, so it would be nice if Penhaligon's reformulated and dropped the lemon... (Maybe pop in some neroli and oleander?) Otherwise, once the citrusy opening settles, the smell is quite unique. Somehow the mix of juniper, and the base notes make it something absolutely crazy addicting to me. It gets better the more it develops on the skin/clothes. It stays quite long on the clothes at least and I got a good few hours from it otherwise. It definitely has a cold sparkly aura about it while being close to the skin. Feels refreshing on the hot summer day and the heat makes the ambergris and musk pop up. Then it is just pure magic to me. I really struggle with that opening though, it's just so synthetic. It makes me hesitate on repurchasing. Also the fact that it would use a few more nuancing notes here and there to enhance it for the price tag.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1906303"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1906303#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1903657" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1903657" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bluehydrangeas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1446816"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="bluehydrangeas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1903657ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1903657" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1446816">bluehydrangeas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-16">08/16/23 10:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I’ll keep it short and sweet. The rose in this is the same rose as elizabethan rose and therefore this smells to me like a citrus version of elizabethan rose. It’s less powdery that ER I would say it could be a flanker of it. It’s got enough presence to warrant my appreciation, but not my money.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1903657"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1903657#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1903457" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1903457" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Diajanna"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1378612"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1378612.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Diajanna" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dries-Van-Noten/Camomille-Satin-96541.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96541.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Camomille Satin"title="Camomille Satin"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1903457ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1903457" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1378612">Diajanna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-16">08/16/23 06:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Citrus perfect for summer definitely. I think this will radiate further with hotter climate. I used this recently in my Brighton weekend and ai got complimented with this. I adore this and lucky enough to have this in the full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1903457"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1903457#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1903064" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1903064" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="astralmonad870"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1555935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="astralmonad870" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dries-Van-Noten/Jardin-de-L-Orangerie-72594.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72594.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jardin de L'Orangerie"title="Jardin de L'Orangerie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1903064ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1903064" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935">astralmonad870</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-15">08/15/23 16:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Although this is EDT it is a slightly more substantial, lemon-y version of Juniper Sling that performs better! But it's very subtle and beautiful at the same time. I admit that I've learned to value lighter but soothing and mellow scents that aren't as noisy in creating a a sillage around me. When I tried this for the first time in November, it just smelled like lemons to my underdeveloped olfactory senses so I didn't appreciate it. But now that I've become more sophisticated with a collection of 100+ perfumes, I can appreciate a work of art when I smell it. I came across part of a 5 ml sample that had some juice left in it, and the herbal lemon with the undertone of florals was just beautiful. So I had to replenish my stock with a 100ml bottle someone was selling for a massive discount on Ebay. I think this might soon become my new signature scent. This is my favourite feminine Penhaligon’s, followed by Solaris.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1903064"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1903064#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1899859" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1899859" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vanillaesquegirl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1812348"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1812348.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vanillaesquegirl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70052.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eilish"title="Eilish"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1899859ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1899859" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1812348">vanillaesquegirl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-11">08/11/23 16:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>luna is one of the few perfumes that aren’t vanilla or sweet that have found it’s way into my heart. when i first got it, i was expecting to be a disappointing floral smell that would make me gag, but to my pleasant surprise, it quickly became one of my favorite perfumes in an instant! on first spray, the lemon citrusy scent is very strong alongside a surprisingly nice soapy smell to it. eventually a rose note does come out as the perfume dries down, but it isn’t overbearing and the citrusy scent stays as the main note of the fragrance. i definitely like that luna makes me feel and smell very clean and fresh, almost as if i smelt like i was fresh laundry out of the dryer. this also lasts me as long as the babylon perfume, which i absolutely love! i do wish the sillage lasted me longer, but other than that, luna is a great perfume for the spring and summer season that will definitely make you feel and smell like you’re in the middle of a sunflower field on a sunny, windy day!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1899859"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1899859#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1895669" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1895669" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Clairexoxo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1617341"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1617341.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Clairexoxo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1895669ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1895669" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1617341">Clairexoxo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-06">08/06/23 12:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On my skin I mainly get beautiful citrusy notes, rose, and a prominent dose of ambergris. I struggle with the rose-ambergris combo, I find it a bit sickening. Besides that, it is a well blended feminine fragrance for Spring. I get 7 hours of longevity with good sillage for the first 2 hours</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1895669"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1895669#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1891733" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1891733" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Liliana"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1803137"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1803137.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Liliana" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1891733ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1891733" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1803137">Liliana</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-01">08/01/23 07:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow! Initially, I just wanted to give it a try without expecting much, but Luna's performance truly exceeded my expectations. The refreshing and juicy opening of lemon and bergamot amazed me, evoking a sense of ethereal moonlight, leading me down a moonlit and dim path through the woods, searching for the delicately fragrant garden at the end.<br />
<br />
Though the store clerk mentioned that Penhaligon's fragrances are gender-neutral, Luna is mostly perceived as a women's perfume. Despite this, I am deeply fascinated by its scent. Unfortunately, even after smearing some Luna body lotion before spraying it on my wrist, its longevity only lasts for about one to two hours. After an hour, the initial citrus and lemon notes gradually fade away, revealing a subtle hint of rose and jasmine, like draping a thin veil over the skin. You need to be close to the skin to sense its presence, this implies that I may need to respray it regularly. <br />
<br />
Now, I approach purchasing new perfumes more cautiously, so I'll visit the department store a few more times to test its performance on my skin. If there are no surprises, it might become my next perfume, and perhaps even a fragrance I'll continue using in the future.<br />
<br />
Smell : 9.5/10 - For me, it's an unbelievably dreamy fragrance.<br />
Performance : 9/10 - Elegant and refined, much like moonlight cascading down.<br />
Uniqueness : 9/10 - It is one of the most distinctive perfumes I've come across so far.<br />
Longevity : Weak, about 1~2 hrs, I will test it with Vaseline next time.<br />
Sillage : Between intimate and moderate I think.<br />
Value : 5/10 - Overpriced, but I really love it.<br />
Personal score : 9.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1891733"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1891733#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1874753" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; L'Ombre is richer, fresher and zestier than Luna, and has more staying power.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1868634"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1868634#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1853385" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Ldl stays green tart and darker while Luna turns into a very pretty powdery citrusy lightly green feminine dream.<br />
I love this but wish it was stronger.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1853385"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1853385#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1852574" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1852574" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="agnes_holl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1696799"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1696799.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="agnes_holl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lush/Turmeric-Latte-Perfume-72229.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72229.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Turmeric Latte Perfume"title="Turmeric Latte Perfume"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1852574ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1852574" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1696799">agnes_holl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-09">06/09/23 06:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Another example for how much skin chemistry matters. People are getting light, fresh, green, soapy, delicate, angelic from this and I'm sitting here in a suffocating cloud of Little Trees air freshener. It's giving car sickness, generic men's cologne and a heavy dose of ambergris.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1852574"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1852574#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1844554" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1844554" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="eaudeeve"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1760327"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1760327.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="eaudeeve" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1844554ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1844554" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1760327">eaudeeve</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-29">05/29/23 14:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>How I imagine an angel would smell. So delicate but fresh and zesty. Powdery. Makes me think of bone China teacups and frilly dresses. I only wish Penhaligons would make an EDP version of Luna.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1844554"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1844554#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1842871" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1842871" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fcounts"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733936"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1733936.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fcounts" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sana-Jardin/Berber-Blonde-46702.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46702.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Berber Blonde"title="Berber Blonde"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1842871ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1842871" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733936">fcounts</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-27">05/27/23 07:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tested this in a shop and absolutely fell in love with it. On my hand it was full on lemon sherbet, fizzy and not overly sweet with the floral background - a bit like a summer cocktail. It didn’t project much so felt like a personal scent, which I liked for this. I kept smelling my hand for the next couple hours, it was really comforting and perfect for the warm weather. It didn’t seem to last long, couple hours and it had faded to a softly floral skin scent. I’d buy a small bottle of this for times I need that lemon.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1842871"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1842871#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1842452" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1842452" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mae.si"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1644242"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1644242.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mae.si" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Liquides-Imaginaires/Fortis-23084.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.23084.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fortis"title="Fortis"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1842452ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1842452" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1644242">mae.si</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-26">05/26/23 15:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Slightly spicy, green rose. Lots of citrus and verbena. Definitely refreshing and clean, but also definitely a skin scent (albeit a long lasting one) after the initial 15min first impression. Wonderful fragrance, but since it’s a bit on the pricier side, its intimate projection is not worth opening up my ApplePay for a FB - as tempting as its packaging design may be! If only it projected a little bit more. 💔 Or, maybe if I had a little less self control… (^｡^)<br />
<br />
However, due to how safe the fragrance is and its beautiful bottle design, I could see this being a fantastic gift for a special occasion. 🎁💐</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; It does smell nice close up, though. Citrusy, rosy, clean and feminine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1842328"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1842328#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1840715" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1840715" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FirstSense"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1323175"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1323175.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FirstSense" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1840715ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1840715" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1323175">FirstSense</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-24">05/24/23 08:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This Penhaligon's is a very light airy citrus fresh fragrance. The first sniff is very timid almost shy. It whispers softly like it's saying, "Relax, take it easy, close your eyes and drift away". From the lime, lemon kinda freshness it goes to a juniper berry herbal smell with very fresh natural rose and jasmin. The very light animalic complexity in the dry down is from the ambergris that is added in just a tiny amount and makes this perfume shine. This cologne like fragrance is made for a lovely princess that goes to sleep in a huge antique room with a beautiful four-poster bed with white satin curtains and a blue ceiling on where stars and a sickle moon are tingling from an old projector. She is in an almost dream state of mind. Don't we all sometimes want to be that fragile princess that floats through life without any worries. Luna smells heavenly, expensive and delicious.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1840715"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1840715#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1828679" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1828679" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Christy Kreyol"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1739202"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1739202.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Christy Kreyol" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Spicebomb-13857.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13857.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spicebomb"title="Spicebomb"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1828679ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1828679" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1739202">Christy Kreyol</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-09">05/09/23 10:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm using it as a skin scent for bed time. It smells amazing to me. But it also feel very light and fragile. Unfortunately it doesn't last a decent amount of time. The sillage is practically absent. Very disappointed in this performance by Penhaligon's. But at least the juice smells nice when you do smell it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1828679"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1828679#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1807344" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Borderline soap, but smells expensive.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1807344"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1807344#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1801616" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
