Could be stronger, but still a really beautiful fresh smell.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1799409"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1799409#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1788251" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1788251" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="coeurlll"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1632115"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1632115.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="coeurlll" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1788251ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1788251" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1632115">coeurlll</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-20">03/20/23 13:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Gorgeous, crisp and perfect to wear while winter turns into springtime. Top notes of bergamot and lemon sparkle right after this is sprayed, then it dries down into a clean bright rose and juniper berry combination. I don’t get much jasmine from Luna and every now and again I do get a faint waft of sour-ness, but overall a really pretty and safe scent for daytime/the office. It is on the pricier side, and for this reason probably wouldn’t repurchase this one in a hurry, if at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1788251"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1788251#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1771339" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1771339" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KermitFrag25"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1696556"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1696556.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KermitFrag25" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38351.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna"title="Luna"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1771339ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1771339" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1696556">KermitFrag25</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-28">02/28/23 07:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Dangerously addicting scent. <br />
I easily get nauseated with scents when I'm in a car but this one doesn't make me dizzy. I get surprised how much I love this scent every morning when I use it! Lasting power is OK and can be a unisex fragrance. Delicately fresh but edgy at the same time. My signature scent 😍</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1771339"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1771339#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1767580" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1767580" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AquaJima"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1339953"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1339953.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AquaJima" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/D-G-Anthology-L-Imperatrice-3-6086.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6086.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="D&G Anthology L'Imperatrice 3"title="D&G Anthology L'Imperatrice 3"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1767580ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1767580" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1339953">AquaJima</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-23">02/23/23 14:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On my skin. is juniper from begging to end. At some point it becomes sharp and almost masculine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1767580"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1767580#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1749422" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1749422" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fleurie20"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/21613"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.21613.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fleurie20" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1749422ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1749422" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/21613">Fleurie20</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-01">02/01/23 20:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Similar to Quercus, this is the fresh citrusy scent that you will find in lots of household goods: dish soap, laundry detergent, dryer sheets, hand soap and all that jazz. The name "Luna" (moon) certainly had prepared me for a much different scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1749422"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1749422#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1726158" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1726158" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="la_fee_verte"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1649480"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1649480.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="la_fee_verte" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Day-Three/Downtown-Deja-Vu-82922.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.82922.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Downtown  Deja-Vu"title="Downtown  Deja-Vu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1726158ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1726158" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1649480">la_fee_verte</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-05">01/05/23 15:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>After reading all the glowing reviews for this, I feel a little bad about what I'm about to say. This is like upscale Febreze to me. Or like a high end hand soap you'd find in a wealthy woman's powder room. I don't really get any citrus from this. I mostly get rose and jasmine. It's a very clean, floral, but otherwise nondescript scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1726158"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1726158#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1721387" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1721387" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="laviebunny"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1432102"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1432102.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="laviebunny" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Twilly-d-Hermes-Eau-Ginger-67667.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67667.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Twilly d'Hermès Eau Ginger"title="Twilly d'Hermès Eau Ginger"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1721387ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1721387" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1432102">laviebunny</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-30">12/30/22 22:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of my interesting finding. Very zesty and smells like lemon trees. I can't smell the floral notes after the drydown, only greens and citrus.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1721387"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1721387#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1714686" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1714686" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Verlyss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1624301"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1624301.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Verlyss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Twilly-d-Hermes-46145.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46145.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Twilly d’Hermès"title="Twilly d’Hermès"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1714686ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1714686" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1624301">Verlyss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-22">12/22/22 00:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The perfume that set me into my perfume journey this year, this was a love at first scent that I impulsively purchased when my friend first tested it at the Escentials perfume shop in KLCC. The moment I smelled it, the song Altar of Dreams by Aspidistrafly began to play in my head I knew I had to have it, being a perfume strong enough to evoke a song on first scent. It feels so fairy-like. <br />
<br />
It's far from a statement type of scent, but rather one ethereal as a mist at moonrise and moonset. There's a soft blanket of refreshing citrus in the opening which I find as comforting as a breeze as one awakes at nightfall, and it dries down to a dreamlike Greek impressionistic, watercolour moonlit rose garden in shades of silver, blue and magenta. Pools of clear water ripple after a light rain, petals float atop it, dewdrops rest atop bushes of roses and jasmine. One traipses barefoot across the stepping stones on the lake, and descends into the lake of silvery moonlight, almost lulled into a slumber by the beauty of the fragrance. <br />
<br />
It also develops beautifully on my skin. The only saddening thing about this fragrance is like what others have said - the longevity is poor for such a steep price, at most 3 hours before it becomes a skin scent. I spray it on my clothes to get at least 5 - 6 hours out of it; on my pillow it would last a whole night. Then again, it is made out of a lot of refreshing accords which are not meant to last long enough. It's good for going to church, having tea with friends or for a date. Not something that would last a whole day. I suppose the dreamlike ethereal quality also extends to its literal longevity - you'll eventually have to wake up from a short-lived, beautiful dream. But after misting my hair quite generously with it, I can catch whiffs of citrusy rosiness the whole day. It also has gotten me quite a few compliments from others after those few generous sprays, that is after several hours have passed since the initial application, whjch means it's still enough to be noticed by others but not enough to be offensive.<br />
<br />
I love it so much that after buying the 30ml bottle and using almost half of it, I bought the 100ml bottle a few months later the moment it was back in stock (and fortunately with a seasonal discount voucher) because there's really no way to obtain this bottle anywhere else in Malaysia other than Escentials KLCC. Penhaligon's doesn't ship directly to Malaysia, and all other methods of shipping are way more expensive. I use it for special occasions and outings, but due to its price point, I do not wear it all the time despite this being the one I consider my signature scent. All my friends who are not into perfume also agree this one is beautiful, and my beau loves this scent on me. <br />
<br />
Easily my top favourite scent only contended by Guerlain's Herba Fresca, which is still are in that "fresh" category, albeit having very different vibes. But Luna officially stays at the top of my list, and I very recently realise it's great layered with another one of my best scents - Coco Mademoiselle Intense, the chypre amber and fresh florals layer amazingly well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1714686"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1714686#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1706043" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1706043" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="natasha calli"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1010673"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1010673.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="natasha calli" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1706043ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1706043" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1010673">natasha calli</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-10">12/10/22 04:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A wonderful scent. A flower that can bloom and shine among a garden of flowers. Truly a citrusy scent but the only flaw is its longevity. Good only for half a day. A light and not offensive fragrance to other people. A good spring and summer scent but you need to reapply after 4 hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1706043"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1706043#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1705394" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1705394" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kjanet"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1457412"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1457412.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kjanet" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Fleur-de-Peau-Eau-de-Parfum-48681.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48681.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fleur de Peau Eau de Parfum"title="Fleur de Peau Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1705394ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1705394" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1457412">kjanet</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-09">12/09/22 06:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A bit overpriced, but lovely. Citrusy, floral, and a bit musky at the same time. Wears close to the skin but I can't stop sniffing my wrists when I'm wearing Luna. It reminds me a bit of Outremer Rose which I remember buying at Anthropologie for around $15 at some point so there are maybe more affordable options for this vibe, but I still adore this fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1705394"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1705394#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1693346" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1693346" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="erika.isme.98"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1404278"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1404278.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="erika.isme.98" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1693346ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1693346" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1404278">erika.isme.98</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-21">11/21/22 16:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance has some of my favorite notes (bergamot, jasmine, juniper berries) and has an almost fantasy quality. <br />
<br />
Like you're in a meadow within a daydream.<br />
<br />
That being said, will I ever reach for this or find it to be a WOW scent? Not sure. It's ok for now. It's nice.  Just smells very safe and almost distant.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1693346"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1693346#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1668068" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Luna smells like a bright and cold fragrance and reminds me of the inside of a box of a new pair of shoes or the box of a bag or a very expensive tie.  Floral varnish and a little balmy but in a good and expensive way.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1636446"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1636446#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1635203" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1635203" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mimookies"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1536425"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1536425.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mimookies" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Laura-Mercier/Eau-Gourmande-Ambre-Vanille-18364.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18364.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Gourmande Ambre Vanille"title="Eau Gourmande Ambre Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1635203ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1635203" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1536425">mimookies</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-31">08/31/22 11:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was a little underwhelmed when I first smelled it (had very high expectations due to price point and reviews). It kind of reminded me of how citrusy hand cream would smell. <br />
Even though it still doesn’t smell “special”, I just can’t get enough of it. It smells really comforting and soothing. I do recommend it as a day perfume but I use the body lotion before going to bed because it just makes me feel good.<br />
<br />
It sadly doesn’t last as long on my skin, but I can still smell it on my clothes after a whole day walking around in the city.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1635203"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1635203#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1631037" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516766">CR95</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-25">08/25/22 08:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nice fresh perfume. Very delicate. Poor silage. Smells like a lemon at the beginning. It's clean but not memorable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1631037"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1631037#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1625314" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1625314" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Percomo_time"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249129"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1249129.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Percomo_time" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ralph-Lauren/Polo-Earth-73298.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73298.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Polo Earth"title="Polo Earth"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1625314ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1625314" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249129">Percomo_time</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-17">08/17/22 03:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>.شروع این کار با دورایحه مختلط همزمان بود. لیمو و رز همزمان<br />
باکارات رژ و میگفتن نبات سوخته  ، اینم یه بویی شبیه حلوا آردی داشت برام در ادامه . یه رز چرب و زعفرونی و شیرین . البته شیرینی تو ذوق زنی نیست. به اندازه و خوبه. . . مدام یه بویی شبیه باکارات رژ رو تو این مرحله حس میکنم .زعفرون در لونا وجود نداره. آیا این شباهت ممکنه بخاطر <br />
 balsam Fir<br />
باشه؟ <br />
این رز شیرین وچرب میتونه تحت تاثیر <br />
 balsam Fir<br />
شیرین و چرب شده باشه؟ نوت دیگه ای که شیرین باشه ندیدم. وقتی باکارات رو چک کردم و این نوت رو در هردو مشترک دیدم کمی قوت قلب گرفتم که این شباهت و اعلام کنم . <br />
تغییر شکل بعدش به سمت حس تمیزی و صابونیه. حالا یه صابون لوکس رز .<br />
و درای داون رُزی امبری . یه رز خامه ای طور<br />
پخش و موندگاری این عطر بالا بود. ۷ ساعت راحت میمونه و پخش داره<br />
 بگیم عطرش سیتروسیه ؟ نه ! ولی سیتروس ابتدایی تقریبا زمان قابل توجهی استشمام میشه. پنج تا ده دقیقه اینطورا. اما یک روند سیتروس تا انتها ، یا سیتروس به تنهایی نداریم. درمورد بخش اروماتیک ، من خیلی حس سبز درختان سوزنی و نگرفتم. خنکایی الدهیدی بیشتر به مشام میومد. <br />
خوشم  اومد؟ کار باکیفیتی بود. طراحی هم خوب بود. ولی شگفت زده نبودم ازش. عطر خوبیه. . اگه یه نفر به من بگه زهرا خوشم اومد ازش ، <br />
.  بنظرت خوبه بخرمش؟ میگم اره . عطر خوبیه. منتها برای بلایند بای نمیتونم پیشنهادی بدم. رزش و بهتره تست کنید. رز ملیح و نرم و شیکی هست. اما با این اوصاف بستگی داره چقدر با رز خصومت داشته باشین.<br />
عطر کاملا زنونه س . .گرچه یونیسکس یاد شده. نشون به اون نشون که اصن این عطر زوج خودش و داره. زوج مردونه داره<br />
.<br />
درمورد اسمش ، باز یه اسطوره یونانی دیگه . یه دورباید ایلیاد و ادیسه رو مرور کنیم واسه این همه اسامی اسطوره های یونانی<br />
.<br />
زوج این عطر <br />
Endymion <br />
هست. اونجا یادی گردم از  نام لونا<br />
میتونید مراجعه کنید</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1625314"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1625314#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1618783" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Crisp, clean and absolutely stunning. This and Empressa are so beautiful and last for ages.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1618783"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1618783#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1613966" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1613966"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1613966#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1611191" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1611191" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hazieee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/4786"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="hazieee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38351.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna"title="Luna"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1611191ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1611191" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/4786">hazieee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-26">07/26/22 17:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At the 0-1 hour mark: On my skin it’s a creamy bitter orange with floral undertones and freshly cut grass overtones. Very unique for sure, but not something I would equate with power, sexuality. More of a “hmm, what’s this? Interesting. Ok let’s move on” kind of scent.<br />
<br />
After 2 hours, faded to a really pleasant fresh floral scent. At 3-4 hours, very close to skin with almost no sillage. Bitter orange scent is totally gone, what's left is a very light and delightful crisp, fresh floral. Too bad nobobdy but me will be able to smell it at this point! This smells even nicer than when first applied.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1611191"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1611191#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1601566" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1336475">Daisv</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-29">06/29/22 16:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening is lemoney, bitter, as if you are sniffing the exact aroma of lemon zest wafting in air. This is very pretty non the less, and defintely a Spring scent. This just conjurs up images of freshly trimmed bushes, out in grassy area, with lemon citrusy aromas, this is very green but not Pungent, in fact it's rather soft so far. The dry down is becoming a bar soap scent. I can appreciate this for the right person, just not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1593833"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1593833#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1591280" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
