padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1581469" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="supermama"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1207611"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="supermama" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/Oud-Bouquet-39739.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39739.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Bouquet"title="Oud Bouquet"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1581469ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1581469" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1207611">supermama</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-10">06/10/22 02:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance reminds me of the scene in the lord of the rings, when Frodo and Sam first left Shire and they saw the wood elves walking in the moonlight.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1581469"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1581469#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1558982" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1558982" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lilykings"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1494742"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1494742.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lilykings" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1558982ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1558982" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1494742">lilykings</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-07">05/07/22 07:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Loved this one. It smells like lemon sherbet to me, and settles into a more mature sherbet (oxymoron? Maybe to some) after about 30 mins - the bergamot starts to overpower and mingle with the rose and ambergris. If anyone is familiar with the scent of the Golden Wonder christmas bath bomb from Lush, the opening scent of this one is a dead ringer. I would probably wear this one to a wedding but mostly I see myself using the bath bomb and spritzing this on to jump into a freshly made bed during a cold winter Christmas time. Probably not worth the price for most but I like to splurge on comforting fragrances so I’ll be picking this one up when I can.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1558982"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1558982#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1558451" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1558451" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="frusia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/171616"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.171616.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="frusia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1558451ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1558451" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/171616">frusia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-06">05/06/22 11:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Why exactly is this called Luna? It's a rose scent with citrus and musk, very feminine, very pleasant, but really nothing outstanding or moon-like about it. I like it, but let's be honest, you can easily buy a nice rose-citrus-musk combination for a fraction of Luna's price. <br />
<br />
@KateAtkins: I'm not sure if there are many cheap knock offs of Luna, or whether Luna is an expensive knock off of popular fragrances...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1558451"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1558451#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1558182" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1558182" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="allthatis_barelythere"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1485149"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1485149.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="allthatis_barelythere" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1558182ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1558182" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1485149">allthatis_barelythere</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-06">05/06/22 03:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very citrus-y opening, then a heavier bitter orange note comes through strong. On me, it dries down to a soft floral with almost no citrus. It smells generically clean, like hotel bathroom products. I've been looking for the perfect just-showered scent, but I didn't love this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1558182"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1558182#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1557130" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1557130" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hannahwdraws"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1241060"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1241060.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hannahwdraws" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1557130ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1557130" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1241060">hannahwdraws</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-04">05/04/22 14:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I usually want a perfume that goes with what I'm doing for the day, which I think is why I'm hesitant to invest in a bottle of Luna. It absolutely lives up to the name and makes me want to curl up and sleep in a luxurious, sumptuous bed. Clean, crisp, comfort, white sheets with the window open and deep, darky sky and a moon so bright... Honestly it'll be over for me if they release this as a candle, hair, or pillow mist. I'd never wake up again.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1557130"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1557130#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1548312" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1548312" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KateAtkins"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1490465"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1490465.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KateAtkins" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Matiere-Premiere/Radical-Rose-66043.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66043.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Radical Rose"title="Radical Rose"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1548312ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1548312" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1490465">KateAtkins</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-21">04/21/22 21:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I feel like there are too many cheap knock offs of this for me to like it. It’s so solid in the base notes that all I can smell is over stuffed beach air bnbs. It just feels so much like every hotel swimming pool spa I’ve been in.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1548312"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1548312#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1547642" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1547642" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ars Amatoria"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1490208"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1490208.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ars Amatoria" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tocca/Florence-4840.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4840.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Florence"title="Florence"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1547642ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1547642" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1490208">Ars Amatoria</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-21">04/21/22 01:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I adore this perfume at first spray: a zesty, lively, sophisticated citrus. But then it mellows within minutes to be almost pure rose with a hint of balsam fir below. It is a very lovely rose, creamy and pure without the synthetic pungency of cheap rose perfumes, but it *is* just rose and I expected so much more from Penhaligon's (especially given their other rose dominated perfumes). It smells like a rose garden with the scent of an evergreen forest blown by on a gentle breeze. It is not the best performer in terms of longevity but it is not the worst, and sillage is moderate for me at first but then weak after about an hour. For the price, it's a definite miss for me. The complexity just is not there. However, if you love a simple rose scent and have money to burn then I would recommend it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1547642"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1547642#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1540436" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1540436" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="findingkikko"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1485105"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1485105.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="findingkikko" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38351.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna"title="Luna"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1540436ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1540436" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1485105">findingkikko</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-09">04/09/22 22:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is s a blind buy for me and I'm in love. It is a beautiful scent that makes me feel excited with every spray. it feels like wearing flowers in my hair.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1540436"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1540436#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1522700" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1522700" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ysu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1469863"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1469863.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ysu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1522700ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1522700" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1469863">Ysu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-13">03/13/22 18:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I blind bought Luna due to its reputation as a crowd favorite (and it's darling little bottle) during Penhaligon's March Mystery event. <br />
<br />
It starts off with a lychee-lemon scent- a review on Penhaligon's site describes it as a 'lychee martini', which I agree with- sometimes when you catch a whiff of it, it smells slightly alcoholic. It dries down to a slightly citrusy, soapy rose with catches of fir and balsam. <br />
<br />
I'm editing my review because I originally called this a wholly rose scent. I actually did /not/ particularly like this on my first day owning it, but it has grown on me.<br />
<br />
At the behest of another comment, I sprayed this on my pillow and clothes before I went to sleep. I'm convinced it has to do with my skin chemistry- the notes of evergreen trees linger much more prominently against the rose and slight citrus on fabric than (my) skin. It is a pretty scent, but the dry down is still too sweet for my tastes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1522700"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1522700#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1522618" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1522618" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sweep13"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1218972"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1218972.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sweep13" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38351.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna"title="Luna"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1522618ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1522618" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1218972">Sweep13</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-13">03/13/22 14:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I absolutely love this scent. To me it smells of slightly sweet sherbet lemon, but it’s not sickly at all, its fresh. <br />
Although I love the scent, it doesn’t last thirty minutes on my skin, very disappointing. So I wouldn’t repurchase.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1522618"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1522618#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1513275" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1513275" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="maylily11"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1465915"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="maylily11" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1513275ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1513275" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1465915">maylily11</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-27">02/27/22 16:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>when I first smelt this perfume I thought it smelt of Christmas (not sure how in hindsight) but I came back to smell it again to get it for Christmas and I still loved it, though it smelt different from how I initially thought. I now wear it as my signature scent and it's super clean and citrusy in the opening and dries down to a pretty rose. The longevity is good and I feel like I only need two sprays to already surround myself with it. the downside is sometimes if I'm not in the mood the citrus can smell too spicy and give me a bit of a headache but it doesn't put me off the perfume and I still do a little dance when I smell it at the start of my day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1513275"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1513275#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1508621" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1508621" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="E-Aurora"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1462647"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="E-Aurora" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1508621ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1508621" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1462647">E-Aurora</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-20">02/20/22 15:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was looking for a new citrus perfume that would perform better than most colognes and would be suitable for day wear.<br />
<br />
The perfume does last a long time and I found that I could wear it both during the day and at night. Although it’s more complex than most citrus fragrances, I find the “fresh” notes to be completely overpowering the lemon and bergamot notes. <br />
<br />
I am actually quite sad that I ended up not liking this perfume. When I spray it I can smell the lemon, but very quickly the smell changes. As it develops during the day, it smells more like a bathroom cleaning product.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1508621"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1508621#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1499669" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1499669" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marie76"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/138192"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.138192.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marie76" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Estee-Lauder/Tender-Light-69708.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69708.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tender Light"title="Tender Light"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1499669ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1499669" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/138192">Marie76</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-07">02/07/22 15:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a cute floral, only citrus for the first hour, and despite not listing it there, the Jasmin /rose smells very much like Lily of the Valley. It's got excellent staying power, and it's very beautiful and feminine, but it has no strong personality, I would say. I think it would be really good for layering. I think something cinnamon or sandalwood would suit it really well and carry it into the night. Stays for hours and hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1499669"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1499669#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1487817" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1487817" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Carla_Louise"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1448534"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Carla_Louise" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1487817ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1487817" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1448534">Carla_Louise</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-21">01/21/22 07:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Delicate, sensual beauty, captivating the wearer and those surrounding. I was pleasantly surprised at how versatile this fragrance is and love the style of the bottle. It feels more unique than other fragrances in this genre making me want a full size bottle however I am very disappointed in the sillage and longevity of this fragrance, if it had lasting power I would consider this becoming a signature scent. I feel that if Penhaligons came out with a perfume or perfume oil I would quite happily add a full size bottle of Luna to my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1487817"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1487817#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1481974" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1481974" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sewist"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1444183"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sewist" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frederic-Malle/Portrait-of-a-Lady-10464.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10464.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Portrait of a Lady"title="Portrait of a Lady"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1481974ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1481974" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1444183">Sewist</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-12">01/12/22 21:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just got a 10 ml spray bottle of Luna as a bonus with purchase of a full size Bewitching Yasmine (current offer at Nordstrom). Was feeling bold and gave a solid spray to one arm and oh my - can't get rid of it! Points for staying power. As others have said, it clings to clothes, so now I'll have to soak my wool cardi. Learned my lesson! This fragrance goes to the cleaning product side of citrus on me. To be kinder, it's like a very strong bathroom candle. Maybe it's the juniper or fir? Those have never been notes I seek out. Rose and jasmine barely there at first and were quickly overwhelmed. No warmth under the sharp citrus on me. I'm still smelling it as I type and my throat has gotten irritated, and this is after seven hours with two soapy washings. It's actually gotten worse over time. Anyway, agree with some others that it's a daytime summery fragrance - def not evocative of moonlit nights. Will be passing this on. Time to change clothes and shower.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1481974"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1481974#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1481446" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1481446" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="antoniov"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1412066"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="antoniov" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1481446ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1481446" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1412066">antoniov</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-12">01/12/22 05:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is a beautiful rose and citrus scent but it is very discreet and light. I feel this is one of the best Penhaligon's fragrances on my skin and smells better than the Dutchess Rose. It also has a surprisingly good performance for an eau de toilette as other eau de perfums I've tried from them tend to disappear after a while.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1481446"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1481446#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1475777" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1475777"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1475777#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1470338" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1470338" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cheviota"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379462"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1379462.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cheviota" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montale/Intense-Cafe-18021.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18021.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Intense Cafe"title="Intense Cafe"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1470338ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1470338" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379462">cheviota</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-25">12/25/21 22:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely gorgeous. Opens up with bright citrus and dries down to a soft rose and juniper berry with subtle hints of balsam fir. The notes are spot on. Though others have mentioned that it is oddly sunny for a moon inspired scent, the dry down is where Luna really shines. It evokes an image of a lavish rose garden bathed in moonlight. Elegant, alluring, and utterly beautiful.<br />
<br />
However, sillage and longevity are absolutely abysmal as it lasts about two hours on me as a skin scent before completely disappearing, which is heartbreaking as I would have loved for this to be my signature scent. Especially considering the price, I'd hold back on buying a full bottle until they release an EDP.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1470338"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1470338#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1465013" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1465013" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Project Nostalgia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1371477"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1371477.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Project Nostalgia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/My-Way-62036.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62036.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="My Way"title="My Way"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1465013ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1465013" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1371477">Project Nostalgia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-17">12/17/21 03:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolute love for me! <br />
<br />
Initial blast of the lemon and citruses, which then opens into the juniper and floral notes, and is anchored with the musk.<br />
<br />
This was an unexpected love, looking at those notes it does not suggest anything "special" but to me this would be full bottle worthy.<br />
<br />
For an EDT this has good longevity, moreso when sprayed on clothing. <br />
<br />
Very comforting and refined. Amazing quality as usual from Penhaligon's. <br />
Would appeal to citrus lovers and someone who enjoys a more subdued scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1465013"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1465013#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1448647" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Smells so fresh and sophisticated. It’s just a bummer that this doesn’t last very long and really expensive given the weak performance. Penhaligon’s, please make a longer lasting version!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1448647"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1448647#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1441095" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1441095" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lorna.1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1133466"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1133466.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lorna.1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Babycat-73149.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73149.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Babycat"title="Babycat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1441095ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1441095" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1133466">lorna.1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-06">11/06/21 07:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Alienor Massenet has created such a beautiful fragrance that, to me, leans feminine to my nose. I love the bottle and the colour of the violet juice. The Balsam fir kicks up the gorgeous citruses and provides an airy aromatic experience in the opening that is intoxication and what I imagine Heaven would smell like.<br />
The Juniper is not gin like to me; it is balanced by the rose and sparkles but not boozy. Luna is not a blind buy option because some people say it doesn't last on the skin, and I get a reasonable 4-6 hours on my skin, hair and clothes. <br />
<br />
I sampled Luna at the end of the Summer and again during the Autumn, and I plan on getting her back out in Spring now that I own a full bottle. I would love to see how she would fair layered with the soaps and matching body lotion, so I will try this once I get some.<br />
<br />
I love this, and I think any age group could wear it in the day and if you are having a late midsummer night evening in the garden with some gin and orange desserts.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1420569" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kaylietam"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1396245"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="kaylietam" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1420569ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1420569" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1396245">kaylietam</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-01">10/01/21 20:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love Luna, there's something about it that gives off a mysterious, sexy vibe. The top notes are typical citrus notes, but it quickly transitions to an extraordinary floral note with musk peeking through. As a rose scent lover, I really couldn't tell the rose in the middle notes though. It's so beautiful, but hard to express in words. It's a perfume that makes me feel very sexy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1420569"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1420569#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1416650" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1416650" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lihsinhsu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1273388"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="lihsinhsu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1416650ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1416650" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1273388">lihsinhsu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-25">09/25/21 04:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am in love with this fragrance. The opening is like a floral version of Jo Love's pomelo, which is one of my favorite fragrances. After 10 minutes the scent gradually becomes more floral. I'd say more rose than jasmine. At this point the scent reminds me of MFK's rose fragrance (can't remember the name.)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1416650"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1416650#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1412333" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1412333" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KymIndigo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1368555"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1368555.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KymIndigo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Goldfield-Banks-Australia/Pacific-Rock-Moss-44120.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.44120.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pacific Rock Moss"title="Pacific Rock Moss"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1412333ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1412333" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1368555">KymIndigo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-17">09/17/21 18:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I can instantly see why Luna is such a crowd favourite. Fresh green lemon, bergamot and bitter orange open the scent, which quickly fades to include juniper, soft musky rose and a mellow, understated jasmine. It stays at a perfectly blended, non-sweet, light and fresh natural citrus on a soft bed of musk rose for a few hours. <br />
<br />
My only issue with this fragrance is that it's an EDT and doesn't last very long at all. The Scent Library sample set I have uses glass daubers rather than atomisers, and I've lathered it on about five times to be able to smell it substantially enough to review. I think if you had a bottle of this you'd need to overspray quite a bit. Please Penhaligon's, make an EDP or a body lotion of this so I can lather my entire self in this fresh beauty!<br />
<br />
I can see Luna being someone's signature scent. It's a beautiful, high quality, perfectly balanced, multi-use freshie. Although I'm immediately obsessed with this fragrance and it's going straight on my Full Bottle Worthy list, the lasting power of the EDT keeps me tentive about justifying the purchase.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1412333"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1412333#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1411387" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1411387" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="racsab"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1354203"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1354203.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="racsab" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/Citron-28-Seoul-62513.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62513.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Citron 28 Seoul"title="Citron 28 Seoul"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1411387ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1411387" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); It stayed a while. But the hype is so not worth it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1411387"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1411387#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1410738" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
