align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1410738"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1410738#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1404681" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1404681" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pweedyadel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1159472"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1159472.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pweedyadel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/La-Belle-55786.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55786.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Belle"title="La Belle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1404681ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1404681" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1159472">pweedyadel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-05">09/05/21 01:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Luna is a pretty citrusy scent in the opening and dries down to this beautiful rose scent. The rose is not your typical jammy rose scent; this rose is green and fresh. This is represented well as very classy and elegant. One that a mum will wear to a high tea party or a PTA meeting at a rich international school. <br />
The lemon and rose is very well balanced and worth my pennies 💴</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1404681"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1404681#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1402240" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1402240" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mreowly"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1373814"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1373814.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mreowly" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1402240ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1402240" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1373814">Mreowly</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-31">08/31/21 19:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very pretty girlish rose. In my limited experience with fragrances, I instantly fell in love from top to finish. I had Initio Atomic Rose for testing and Luna smells more or less like the budding blossoming daughter of that scent without becoming a dark creamy rose.<br />
<br />
Cute for daytime wear in my Southeast Asian tropical weather and would probably work best on individuals who stay young and curious at heart. It's just a constant joyful scent and the dry-down is very sweet yet gentle. An interesting sunshiny take on the Moon Goddess?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1402240"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1402240#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1397811" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1397811" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="perfume_obsessed"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1294610"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="perfume_obsessed" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1397811ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1397811" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1294610">perfume_obsessed</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-24">08/24/21 02:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have a sample of Luna that I’ve recently singled out for use from my samples collection.  Months ago when I first got it and tried it, I found it lighter and more rosy - which is what I’ve been craving.  I really liked it then, which is why I decided to try it now, in quarantine, when little luxuries make a big difference.  Sampling it again now, it’s nothing like I remembered it!  It’s lovely and I enjoy it, but this time I’m reminded of Baccarat Rouge thanks to juniper and balsam fir, but that’s kind of all I’m getting - none of the lovely rose I was wanting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1397811"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1397811#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1395055" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1395055" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lara_rania"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1303234"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1303234.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lara_rania" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1395055ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1395055" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1303234">lara_rania</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-19">08/19/21 07:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What can I say about Miss Luna...she is divine.<br />
I purchased in Covent Garden in 2018 (London) after spending hours in the Penhaligon's atelier. Of all the stunning and unique scents I sampled, this one stood out to me. I happily purchased and brought it back home to NY...then I could not stand the smell for almost a year. I cannot explain why, but it left a sickly effect of powdery overload. I firmly believe environment, temperature and sometimes age help fragrances get better over time. <br />
<br />
I picked this up again in late 2019 and have been obsessed ever since. I've been spraying Luna liberally since May, as it has become my signature summer scent. I also recommend playing with layering of other niche scents like JHAG Mmmmm for a sweeter vibe or PDM Delina for a layered rose effect. <br />
<br />
Regardless, Luna is a lovely stand-alone that just makes me happy when I wear her, and the lasting power on clothes is crazy...days later I still smell her bright, floral airiness on my favorite cardigan. I highly recommend Luna, but definitely sample first because if you're a rose lover, this is not your typical rose sillage, and if you hate rose, this might bridge the nose gap for you...or you'll hate it. <br />
<br />
9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1395055"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1395055#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1378671" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1378671" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Murmur123123"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1310171"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Murmur123123" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1378671ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1378671" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1310171">Murmur123123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-20">07/20/21 01:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very nice rose perfume, with a strong citrus note which makes it perfect for hot weather. The rose here is fresh, a bit green, not really sweet or jammy. There is a noticeable similarity between Luna and Diptyque L'ombre dans l'eau, but Luna is more citrusy and a bit simpler. I do like Luna but I wish its longevity and projection could be stronger, especially considering the price point of Penhaligon's perfumes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1378671"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1378671#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1369665" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1369665" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Malifiscent"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242642"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1242642.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Malifiscent" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Fort-Manle/Confessions-of-a-Garden-Gnome-44852.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.44852.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Confessions of a Garden Gnome"title="Confessions of a Garden Gnome"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1369665ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1369665" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242642">Malifiscent</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-02">07/02/21 13:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the first few rose perfumes that got rid of the stereotype I had on rose fragrances. I fell more and more in love with it. Luna is far from old or overdone, quite modern but in a very classy and elegant way. I absolutely agree with the review below about it being a very quintessential British scent. It starts off just a little bit zesty, but not in an overpowering manner. The entire scent has a subtle delivery being quite airy, dewy, and fresh.<br />
<br />
It smells like roses with all the green leaves and stems thrown in and blended with a little bit of zest and a slightly icy finish. This reminds me of a woodland or garden tea party decorated in clean whites, filled with people who are also dressed in a simple and clean fashion. All the notes are well blended, and the dry down just gets more dewy, pretty and balanced. Luna just has a very "effortlessly pretty" vibe to it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1369665"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1369665#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1369312" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1369312" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lillybethholmes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1300279"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="lillybethholmes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1369312ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1369312" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1300279">lillybethholmes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-02">07/02/21 02:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this. It's zesty, it's fresh, it's juicy. Elegant and delicate dew-dropped rose and an ice cold G&amp;T surrounded by woodland, a touch of the mineral ambergris. I feel like every note is balanced and present in equal measure. Nothing dominates. And then it's gone :( <br />
So short-lived. I couldn't pay Penhaligon's prices for something so fleeting. If you have the budget for frequent top-ups throughout the day, it's truly wonderful.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1369312"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1369312#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1363093" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1363093" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="penguinrabbit"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349583"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="penguinrabbit" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clean/Fresh-Laundry-6763.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6763.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fresh Laundry"title="Fresh Laundry"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1363093ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1363093" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349583">penguinrabbit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-20">06/20/21 09:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Orange comes through first, then rose and fir tree. It has a "cool" character if that makes sense. Different combination to anything else I have ever sampled, one of my favourites from Penhaligon's I just wish there was slightly less rose and a bit more fir tree in the dry down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1363093"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1363093#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1363020" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1233088">Salalome</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-20">06/20/21 06:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oddly this smells like camomile and mimosa to me with the juniper projecting some almost savory freshness. I have to give this time I guess...<br />
This has become my gobtoo anxiety fragrance. Its calming and comforting. Not realy wat I want to smell like but what I want to smell when I have to do dreading things like doctors apointments.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1363020"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1363020#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1356046" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1356046" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mb0793"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1344154"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mb0793" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentina-Poudre-34936.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.34936.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentina Poudre"title="Valentina Poudre"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1356046ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1356046" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1344154">mb0793</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-07">06/07/21 10:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my favorite summer perfume. It's the quintessential British scent. Fresh citrusy gin and tonic with the most delicate rose ever. It's definitely unisex but I find that it leans a bit feminine.  It has the classic Penhaligons after shave feeling.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1356046"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1356046#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1330279" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1330279" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="blossomka"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1321912"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1321912.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="blossomka" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1330279ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1330279" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1321912">blossomka</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-22">04/22/21 13:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>6/10. Sweet rose. This is the exact scent the salons use in their hair conditioner.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1330279"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1330279#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1322262" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1322262" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jaclyncxh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1314803"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1314803.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jaclyncxh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4547.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Artemisia"title="Artemisia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1322262ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1322262" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1314803">jaclyncxh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-09">04/09/21 06:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Mouth-watering, juicy yet creamy and soft, lemon meringue and juniper berries with a hint of a very light fresh watery jasmine and roses. It's hard to pin-point the notes as they sort of meld into this beautiful beautiful fog. It's mysterious - soft - ethereal. There's definitely a soft muskiness. I find this scent so fresh, yet deep, comforting and intoxicating. Pretty linear all the way. I do absolutely love it, I have a little coffret practically glued to my nose. Unfortunately its so light, with such a moderate to poor silage and longevity on me, it lasts about 2-3 hours. <br />
<br />
I am conflicted. I love it but I find it barely worth the price tag for that sort of longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1322262"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1322262#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1320861" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1320861" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sofiebgoode"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/410671"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.410671.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sofiebgoode" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Donna-Karan/DKNY-Be-Delicious-498.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.498.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="DKNY Be Delicious"title="DKNY Be Delicious"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1320861ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1320861" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/410671">sofiebgoode</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-07">04/07/21 03:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>While it's true that it shares some aspects with YSL In Love Again and Diptyque's Ombre, Luna is less sour than those and a bit colder, darker, and more severe, especially after the top notes have faded. No less beautiful, but different in personality. <br />
<br />
One more thing that sets Luna apart from similar fragrances is the fir note, which reminds me a lot of Diptyque's Sapin Candle (the Christmas tree candle they do every year). And while Luna is certainly a great choice for spring and summer, once you've picked up that festive Christmas tree note you can't help wondering whether it wouldn't be an absolutely stellar winter fragrance, too!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1320861"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1320861#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1307310" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1307310" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cherry_Darling"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1003821"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1003821.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cherry_Darling" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Pascal-Morabito/Perle-Pour-Elle-47506.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47506.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Perle Pour Elle"title="Perle Pour Elle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1307310ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1307310" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1003821">Cherry_Darling</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-13">03/13/21 13:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet lemons, musks, just a whisper of juniper and rose. I loved this one best the first time I went into a Penhaligon's, now I do think it's a little overpriced as a short lived citrus. This isn't super short lived actually. Medium I would say, it's very nice and musks and florals linger for long. Reminds me of Micallef Osaito. Both very unisex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1307310"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1307310#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1292458" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1292458" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ingeneuxo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1280821"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1280821.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ingeneuxo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Byredo/Rose-Of-No-Man-s-Land-31931.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31931.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rose Of No Man's Land"title="Rose Of No Man's Land"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1292458ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1292458" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1280821">ingeneuxo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-14">02/14/21 06:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>-Sparkly, light scent with a hint of citrus.<br />
-Linear scent.<br />
-Not fbw. (-)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1292458"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1292458#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1282659" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1282659" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tulpan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1110821"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tulpan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rihanna/Reb-l-Fleur-10554.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10554.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Reb'l Fleur"title="Reb'l Fleur"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1282659ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1282659" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1110821">Tulpan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-27">01/27/21 09:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Uplifting opening with juicy citruses amd white florals, making it a very pretty scent reminiscent of summertime. The drydown is very different to the opening as it becomes more aromatic, musky and powdery, while being sweet and feminine. In a way I prefer it more than the opening, which is good as it lasts on and on. I wish it projected a bit more, as it soon stays close to the skin, however can always spray more!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1282659"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1282659#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1274042" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1274042" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ginandrice"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1246357"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1246357.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ginandrice" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Aesop/Hwyl-46895.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46895.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hwyl"title="Hwyl"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1274042ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1274042" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1246357">ginandrice</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-11">01/11/21 01:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Luna opens with a sweet-tart, juicy citrus note. Then comes crisp, fresh rose, and third—partially hidden behind the rose—some green, woodsy notes. <br />
<br />
It’s a very unified fragrance—the zingy freshness of juniper berries and balsam fir blending seamlessly into the crispness of the rose, which in turn blend seamlessly into the sweet-tart juiciness of the citrus. The unity of it makes Luna refreshing and pleasing, though also much too demure for my personal preference.<br />
<br />
Personally, I don’t get a lunar vibe from Luna at all. I get something more akin to dawn: the sweetness of fresh dew and early-morning sun. The fragrance shifts as it wears, from crisp and brisk, into a soft, fresh sweetness. I picture a young, professional woman out for an early-morning jog as the sun comes up.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1274042"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1274042#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1266209" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1266209" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vega_012"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/170034"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.170034.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vega_012" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-Leather-61523.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61523.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Halfeti Leather"title="Halfeti Leather"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1266209ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1266209" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/170034">vega_012</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-27">12/27/20 07:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is aptly named. It’s a citrusy rose scent with a touch of jasmine softened by ambergris that swirls close to the surface, like the silvery moon reflected in a lily pond. Easily a springtime/ summer fragrance, it is subtle like moonlight, but bright enough to reveal definition in the landscape without sacrificing mystery.  It is my favourite Penhaligon’s fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1266209"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1266209#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1261654" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1261654" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="heavenly androgyne"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1280968"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1280968.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="heavenly androgyne" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1261654ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1261654" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1280968">heavenly androgyne</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-16">12/16/20 04:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>You as a guy need to have enough guts to dare to wear LUNA. It reminds me the final major arcana of tarot cards the World which portraits a stunningly androgynous dancer who lifts one foot in the air and rests the other on the ground. <br />
<br />
I am a Piscean and I sense a lot of things in the air.  When I wear Luna, I notice people react differently towards me in a positive way. Not a calculated seductive perfume but a rather nonchalent and sophisticated sense. You look at the world behind the veil of moonlight and so does the world. <br />
<br />
The key word of the World card is completion.  Luna from Penhaligon's is calling for my awareness of both male and female energy inside of me. Love it. <br />
<br />
There are indeed many similiarities between Luna and "L'ombre dans L'eau" from Diptyque as people mentioned. For me Luna is a more settled and balanced sense, like beautifully aged men or women who have seen the world in its light and shadow.  The Diptyque version is more crispy and vivid, which sometimes may fall out of place or asks for too much attention.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1261654"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1261654#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1255582" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1255582" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Splenodour"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1269283"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1269283.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Splenodour" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Goutal/Nuit-et-Confidences-46239.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46239.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nuit et Confidences"title="Nuit et Confidences"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1255582ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1255582" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1269283">Splenodour</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-01">12/01/20 23:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think this fragrance is suitably named. To me this evokes images of full moon in wintery snowy scenery. Cool cold moody. Love the initial first couple of minutes in the citrus domain, but after that the scent becomes too rosy for my taste. Also agree with ScarlettX that this has a masculine undertone. I don´t hate this, but at least at the moment I would not want to wear this. I might come back to this and change my mind though...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1255582"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1255582#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1250749" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1250749" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MaquiLab"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254834"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1254834.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MaquiLab" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1250749ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1250749" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254834">MaquiLab</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-11-20">11/20/20 01:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh, I love Luna! I can definitely see why it's a bestseller. It's fresh but not overly so, it's feminine, it's zesty but not in an artificial way. It's effervescent, like the moonlight in a beautiful Italian garden. You can feel the roses, the jasmine, floating in the cool night air. An ethereal experience I'd love to bathe in.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1250749"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1250749#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1225316" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1225316" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="scensitive"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1226445"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1226445.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="scensitive" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Jasmin-Des-Anges-48383.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48383.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jasmin Des Anges"title="Jasmin Des Anges"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1225316ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1225316" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1226445">scensitive</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-16">09/16/20 20:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>standing at the entrance of a retirement community, staring bleakly into the window glass reflection.<br />
<br />
the automatic doors open and the heat outside subsides with a whoosh of air conditioner.  the cool mixture somehow clings to the carpet bags resting at the feet of the apparation.<br />
<br />
heat from the pavement begins to slowly fry everything resting on it, leaving a residue in the air.<br />
<br />
musty twine, cat hair, rose scented room freshner, vitamin C, plastic utensils, recycled sea water in the lavatory, body odor, and dried flowers.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1225316"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1225316#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1213696" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1213696" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Binchicken"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1251454"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1251454.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Binchicken" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mizensir/Poudre-d-Or-48660.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48660.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Poudre d'Or"title="Poudre d'Or"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1213696ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1213696" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1251454">Binchicken</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-08-19">08/19/20 18:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For me, this smells exactly like fresh cut acidic pineapple next to a dewy rose. I find it young but elegant. My partner thinks it smells too much like air freshener, but we never have the same taste in frags. There is something nostalgic about it. Lasting power is good, especially for a citrus. Siliage moderate. I would think you would have to love rose to love this perfume, at least the way it wears on me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1213696"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1213696#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1133815" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1133815" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="shushkin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/106159"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.106159.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="shushkin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/4160-Tuesdays/White-Queen-51566.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51566.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="White Queen"title="White Queen"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1133815ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1133815" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/106159">shushkin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-01-13">01/13/20 02:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a very delicate and ethereal scent. Lovely but not enough umph for me. It's pretty much a skin scent all along it's timeline on me.<br />
I do get a little lemon but more than not it's a creamy sort of version of a cologne. Calm, cool, serene just like the moon.<br />
There seems to be quite a bit of clean musk present.<br />
Aromatic notes are listed but I can only just about sniff them. I definitely get a little rose and citrus.<br />
A nice scent for spring wear if it was edp strength.<br />
The distant ghost of AG eau de hadrien which I LOVE.<br />
Sorry Penhaligon nice but way too weak.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1133815"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1133815#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1133353" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1133353" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Blooondie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1217137"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1217137.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Blooondie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Little-Italy-2873.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2873.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Little Italy"title="Little Italy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1133353ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1133353" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1217137">Blooondie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-01-11">01/11/20 11:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Luna is my favorite from the House of Penhaligon! FYI...the body cream to match is a MUST HAVE!!! The house is very unique and is comprised of some of the best noses in the industry. Sophisticated and just never lets my curiosity of whats coming next down! A roller coaster for the olfactory if you will...<br />
This fragrance is forever simple captivating. Not overpowering so everyone has no choice but to smell you, but simple as that everyone WANTS to smell you.<br />
<br />
Opens with a subtle citrus, more lime and not rancid peel like. Andddd then my favorite part...the Turkish rose paired in the same garden as the night jasmine...hence the name is just perfect! I close my eyes and can see the moon lit glow of a rose and jasmine garden. With just that little bit of zest to give sort of a metallic night feel and the right amount of green to this fragrance. This can be unisex most like all fragrances from this house...just a magical subtle yet captivating floral.<br />
<br />
Lasts all day for me...but funny I say that since I tend to wear this on an overcast day or long evening events.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1133353"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1133353#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1129711" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The notes on here make it sound like it's a citrus, but it's far more of an ethereal floral to me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1129711"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1129711#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1118199" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1118199" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="xabaras"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/24302"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.24302.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="xabaras" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53875.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Impudent Cousin Matthew"title="The Impudent Cousin Matthew"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1118199ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1118199" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/24302">xabaras</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-11-23">11/23/19 05:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening is a beautiful, fresh lemon breeze which touches you gently and makes you think of Summer. In about ten minutes it develops into a sweet rose which makes you think of Turkish delight sweets and bright pink rose gardens. A lovely fragrance if you like rose, an amazing fragrance if on your skin (like mine) rose fragrances generally take an acidic turn. <br />
I love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1118199"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1118199#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1109190" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1109190" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="natasha.wahyudihardjo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/207549"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="natasha.wahyudihardjo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chinatown-1300.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1300.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chinatown"title="Chinatown"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1109190ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1109190" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/207549">natasha.wahyudihardjo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-10-23">10/23/19 20:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The resemblance between Luna and Diptyque's L'Ombre Dans L'Eau is crazy. I couldn't tell if a person is wearing this or L'Ombre when they pass by. Before purchasing this, I just finished my Baies candle from Diptyque, and that smells just like L'Ombre.<br />
<br />
I really like Luna, I think this is my "feel good" fragrance. It's very easy and likable, I don't think I can tire or get sick of this. It's the type of fragrance that you can just grab and spray freely without worrying if it will be too much or offend anybody.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1109190"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1109190#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1081059" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
