padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1140532">toushiroumimi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-07-22">07/22/19 23:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>hmmmmmmmmmmmmmm...<br />
<br />
It's so interesting how everyone keep getting different notes in this fragrance... It's one of my favorite creations of Penhaligon's simply because I love the fresh floraly scent...  it's not a special fragrance it smells almost regular nothing special...<br />
<br />
but unlike everybody else I smell a dominant Rosy Jasmin scent with an opening of Lemon and bergamont...<br />
<br />
the Sillage is soft as well (it is a floral scent after all)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1081059"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1081059#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1047807" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/43011">Norgirl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-04-04">04/04/19 07:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>ohh what a beauty . Luna I love you.. The smell of this perfume makes me smile and feal warm inside . I love love the tope not of this , Citrusy fir and juniper wow .at this stage it feals like a cold winters morning , And with the name Lune i can imagine myself walking in the snow outside,the moon is still up shining down on me .i breath in the crisp air from the forest close by. The earth is still silent its just me and the moon ..  but then as soon at the Rose peaks forward and starts to dance the image in my head is gone . Initialy i thought blahh. this rose will ruin it for me , It feelt abit ,Soapy and cheap . but as it settles down the fir and citrus blends well with a dash of white flowers and musk. this truly is amazing , a bit shy maybe i was hoping it would be stronger and bolder , But never the less its a beauty and i truly need a bottle of this very soon.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Whoever voted on those similarities above was spot on.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1016203"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1016203#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1011396" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc957670" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="new friend"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/174208"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.174208.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="new friend" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kesma/Cairo-Shair-de-Deesse-21818.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.21818.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cairo (Сhair de Deesse)"title="Cairo (Сhair de Deesse)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma957670ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd957670" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/174208">new friend</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-07-01">07/01/18 10:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>لونا عطر مشرق للغاية، يجمع بين النمطين الإنجليزي والإيطالي<br />
افتتاحية حمضية على النمط الإيطالي البراق المنعش من الليمون الصقلي والبرجموت والبرتقال المر.<br />
قلب العطر هو الأهم حيث يتجلى توت العرعر برائحته التي تجمع ما بين الزهرية والفاكهية وكأنه يجمع ما بين رائحتي زهرة البنفسج بنسبة كبيرة والعنب البري بنسبة أقل.<br />
وحتما سيدعم الجوري والياسمين النوت الزهري بتوت العرعر ليميل العطر الآن للنمط الإنجليزي الذي يجمع ما بين الحمضية والزهرية<br />
وبهذا سيصل العطر لوصف ونمط العطور الصيفية الأنيقة<br />
ومع الدخول للقاعدة ستكمل للمدرسة الإيطالية الطريق حين الدفع ببلسم التنوب، ويا لها من رائحة تشع حياة وجمالا، وسيزيدها عمقا إلى أغوار الأطلسي رائحة عنبر الحوت الممتزجة باليود مع لمحات مسكية لتتمكن حواء من تقبل العطر وبكل ترحاب<br />
الجمال والنقاء ليسا محل التقييم ويكفي ضمان أنه من إنتاج بنهاليجونز<br />
الأداء كثبات وفوحان أعلى من المتوسط 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="957670"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=957670#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent929098" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc929098" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="spumyland"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/189882"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.189882.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="spumyland" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maher-Olfactive/Santal-Auster-60618.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60618.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Santal Auster"title="Santal Auster"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma929098ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd929098" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/189882">spumyland</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-04-03">04/03/18 15:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>LUNA?it can be ... but not nocturnal.This is what you can see during the day! <br />
To my nose this is all lemon, juniper,tonic roses and a touch of bitter orange and jasmine. <br />
All well rounded but constantly sour.<br />
Goes off in traditional clean moss.<br />
<br />
Diurnal and unisex for sure.<br />
<br />
Meh...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="929098"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=929098#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent891829" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc891829" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gizmo1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/72061"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gizmo1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38351.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna"title="Luna"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma891829ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd891829" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/72061">Gizmo1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-12-20">12/20/17 02:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For me, I smell something woodsy (balsam fir?) and citrusy. The perfume is light and lasts about an hour on me. I like it a lot, but it doesn't have much longevity for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="891829"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=891829#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent863198" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc863198" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kageosx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1085731"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="kageosx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Much-Ado-About-The-Duke-40713.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40713.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Much Ado About The Duke"title="Much Ado About The Duke"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma863198ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd863198" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1085731">kageosx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-09-21">09/21/17 09:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On my skin, applied immediately, there is citrus and jasmine. <br />
<br />
After 5 mins, less citrus, more jasmine<br />
<br />
After 30 min, very fresh and distinct (yet not "girly") rose and jasmine, which lasted about 5 hours with moderate silage.<br />
<br />
Very similar to Much Ado About the Duke, minus the peppery cumin. Im still teetering on which I like more.<br />
<br />
9/10 (p.s. i'm a guy)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="863198"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=863198#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent849513" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc849513" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Stundevil"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/540482"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Stundevil" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma849513ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd849513" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/540482">Stundevil</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-08-09">08/09/17 12:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This won't be a repurchase unfortunately.  It's very similar to Diptyque L'eau Dans L'eau which I love...then turns into a weird bitter fresh scent that I can't explain.  I would recommend testing this before purchase to give it time to develop on the skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="849513"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=849513#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent842215" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc842215" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BellaX"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1067824"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1067824.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BellaX" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Marc-Jacobs/Decadence-31226.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31226.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Decadence"title="Decadence"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma842215ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd842215" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1067824">BellaX</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-07-17">07/17/17 14:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is interesting that Penhaligon's decided to call this perfume "Luna" when all I can think of while smelling this is "sunshine" and to be specific the Mediterranean sunshine. To me this is Italy in a bottle. It's the freshness of the lemon and orange, all the citrus Is warmed by the juniper and balsam fir and the rose is there in the background. It's a garden in Italy, it's late afternoon and the warm sun has brought out all the fragrances. <br />
I was first given a sample in January and I liked it straight away but I thought this would work very nicely in summertime. I recently bought a full bottle and it's perfect for this time of the year. It is not a fresh pick me up citrus, it's warm, sensual and comforting. Divine in other words.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="842215"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=842215#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent838034" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc838034" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cellophane93"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1013274"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1013274.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cellophane93" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Byredo/Sunday-Cologne-13044.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13044.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sunday Cologne"title="Sunday Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma838034ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd838034" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1013274">Cellophane93</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-07-03">07/03/17 13:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At first whiff this is juicy, almost-syrupy, delicious citrus. And then rose. And pine needles. For hours. It's a nice, long-lasting, linear scent, but the fir and juniper I think adds a really intriguing, prickly edge to the typical rose theme. I'm not yet sure whether it suits *me*. I'm a guy, and the rose is quite bright and prominent here. It does conjure up a nice image, though: nighttime, kitschy red roses in a deep, dark forest, soft moonlight filtering down. On the right person, I imagine this mix of dusty petals and spiky, mysterious forest notes could be a stunner.<br />
<br />
Also, the juice is not cream-colored like in the picture here: it's a pale purple, very lunar-like. :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="838034"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=838034#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent837763" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc837763" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jeji2c"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/217957"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.217957.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jeji2c" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Pierre-Balmain/Monsieur-Balmain-3819.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3819.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Monsieur Balmain"title="Monsieur Balmain"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma837763ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd837763" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/217957">jeji2c</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-07-02">07/02/17 15:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The fresh, slightly tangy opening of Luna reminds me strongly of L'Ombre dans L'Eau by Diptyque EDT, however if you try to input the latter perfume in the section of "This perfume reminds me of" your attempt would be in vain and apparently it is an intentional block since you could try Luna on the page of L'Ombre dans L'Eau - as if it would cause some apocalyptic catastrophe were perfumista allowed to express truly what they smell and think. Hence，<br />
 my suspicion is that Fragrantica was forced (my guess) to succum to either (if not both) of the companies' "kind reminder". <br />
<br />
So my advice on the two due to the largely coincidental similarity (smell both you would know what I am talking about)?  L'Ombre dans L'Eau is more sour and long lasting while Luna nevertheless is also very exhilarating.  Tough choice but may originality always prevail. :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="837763"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=837763#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent829843" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc829843" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="labellaaddormentata"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/184973"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="labellaaddormentata" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zoologist-Perfumes/Chipmunk-67998.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67998.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chipmunk"title="Chipmunk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma829843ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd829843" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/184973">labellaaddormentata</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-06-07">06/07/17 01:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like it very much. On me it's not citrus-y at all. I basically get a light rose scent.<br />
Usually I don't prefer a prominent rose, but it's so light and embraced by the fir, that I find the outcome very likeable.<br />
I can smell a touch of jasmine, bitter orange and musk, but the othere notes not at all.<br />
I don't get lemon, bergamotte or juniper.<br />
Good longevity.<br />
<br />
A discreet rose scent with a unusual approach. I feel standing out without seeking attention.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="829843"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=829843#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent823153" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc823153" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="helenpeutherer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1032951"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1032951.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="helenpeutherer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/Lime-Basil-Mandarin-5585.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5585.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lime Basil & Mandarin"title="Lime Basil & Mandarin"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma823153ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd823153" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1032951">helenpeutherer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-05-16">05/16/17 06:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tried this today for the first time.  Thought from the description that I'd love it, but bizarrely on me it smells cloying and heavy when applied.   Nothing citrussy and light about it at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="823153"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=823153#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent819322" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc819322" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tinker_Bell"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1029520"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1029520.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tinker_Bell" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma819322ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd819322" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1029520">Tinker_Bell</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-05-04">05/04/17 00:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love at first sniff!<br />
<br />
I went to a cute niche perfumery some weeks ago and the saleswoman asked whether she could do something for me -<br />
 and my answer was "Surprise me!".<br />
<br />
So she looked at me carefully and said that she thought that Luna would fit perfectly. So she sprayed Luna on my neck and on my wrists. And I was in LOVE! It's zesty, citrusy and yet - there is something special and magical about it... I imagine crystals and light when smelling it. It's not playful, not sweet, but cool and clear.<br />
<br />
It lasts the whole day, sillage is very good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="819322"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=819322#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent795311" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc795311" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Serinde"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/994041"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Serinde" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lolita-Lempicka/Lolita-Lempicka-456.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.456.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lolita Lempicka"title="Lolita Lempicka"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma795311ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd795311" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/994041">Serinde</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-02-22">02/22/17 04:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I saw this in the shop just the other day, brand-spanking new, I'd never heard of it. I gave the cap a sniff - holy-moly, it ACTUALLY did smell like moonbeams! Cold and blue, sharp and tingly - so I sprayed. Of course, all there was was citrus. Fine, another citrus based perfume on a glutted market. Not fine if you're allergic to citrus. Not fine if you wanted moonbeams.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="795311"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=795311#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent765324" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc765324" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ScarlettX"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/656487"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.656487.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ScarlettX" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Yellow-Diamond-13064.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13064.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Yellow Diamond"title="Yellow Diamond"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma765324ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd765324" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/656487">ScarlettX</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-11-28">11/28/16 14:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a light and citrusy green fragrance, but has some weird smelling very masculine undertone. This undertone developes with hours and is barely there, but I can sense it.<br />
The fragrance is without sweetness completely. <br />
Something is incredibly odd about it, so I don't like it very well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="765324"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=765324#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent721935" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc721935" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lucywan18"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1009850"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lucywan18" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5674.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Endymion"title="Endymion"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma721935ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd721935" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1009850">Lucywan18</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-07-09">07/09/16 05:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At first it smells really like Diptyque l'ombre dans leau. Just the green and grassy note in Diptyque is replaced by citrus note. However its dry down on me is not as good as the Diptyque as the Diptyque one is more complex, sensual and with more unique character. On me, Luna gets more citrusy unlike the diptyque that gets more rosy and black currant-y. It does smell nice but definitely not as exciting, unique, mesmerising and enticing as diptyque. It may suit ppl that cant stand strong grassy smell as top note. In the end, Luna is more sweet and musky while diptyque smells more like ambergris.<br />
<br />
I just tried in store on my wrist and not going to purchase it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="721935"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=721935#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent712474" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc712474" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Houdini4"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607493"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.607493.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Houdini4" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Indemodables/Vanille-Havane-Coeur-de-Oud-96892.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96892.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanille Havane Coeur de Oud"title="Vanille Havane Coeur de Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma712474ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd712474" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607493">Houdini4</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-06-06">06/06/16 08:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An interesting composition then from Penhaligon's and yet again they don't disappoint in bringing an interesting approach to a fragrance which could so easily have been boring or not to my taste.<br />
 I actually walk my dog of an evening through the city centre and passed the Penhaligon's shop. To cut a long story short, the parade of shops it's on is not on street level and kind of enclosed and when they pump the scent out of the front door, it tends to linger a long time and as such I can still smell it strongly hours after the shop itself is closed. This residual smell of Luna had me intrigued as it smelled very masculine and not really in keeping with the notes I had seen.<br />
Now that I've sampled it I can confirm that this is the case but not indeed the whole story. Luna is much fresher with zingy top notes, citruses and dry juniper giving way to a metallic musk and rose. There's even a hint in here of Amouage Lyric man but Luna is much more bitter and that fir gives a masculine edge. This is in direct contrast with what I had perhaps thought that this fragrance would be about the night flowering, white floral jasmine (hence Luna) and lean more toward the feminine but in truth it's absolutely straight down the middle unisex. I should have known by know that Penhaligon's nearly always deliver a degree of complexity and sophistication to their compositions despite the obvious drawbacks of the brand ie: price, longevity issues, and the 'complexity I mentioned being that little bit too subtle for everyone to notice.<br />
The deep drydown is one of the musky, rose and florals just with the citrus and juniper died right back but in fairness this takes a long time, so as a fresh summery scent it works and lasts fairly well. (although I did put on quite a liberal application.) Maybe that ambergris is what is giving Luna an air of the luxurious? Again I'm not sure what it is but I like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="712474"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=712474#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent709736" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc709736" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="julia.andersson"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1004353"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="julia.andersson" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma709736ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd709736" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1004353">julia.andersson</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-05-28">05/28/16 05:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The zesty opening soon turns into a very clean yet a little spicy fresh shower scent. I get earl grey and a hint of juniper berries turning into subtle creamy red roses. Elegant but not too unique. Would stand out best on a man.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="709736"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=709736#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                    </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent2017099" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2017099" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Celia0506"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1836589"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1836589.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Celia0506" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38351.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna"title="Luna"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2017099ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2017099" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1836589">Celia0506</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-01">01/01/24 13:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the perfume that made me question my entire taste. I usually don't like citruses and white flowers. I'm more of an amber girlie, I love oud, muscs, spices.. <br />
<br />
But this perfume. It's so bubbly and innocent. Pure, soft, clean. It smells like girlhood, love, life, taking a midnight bath alone while talking to the moon... It made me reconnect to myself with so much depth. I feel healed, it's just me in a bottle. <br />
<br />
Oh to have all I ever wanted to be and all I that I ever will be in a bottle...<br />
<br />
On a more serious note, longevity and projection are amazing on me for an EDT. But I wouldn't mind it to be a skin scent, as I feel weirdly intimate with this perfume. <br />
There's a subtle synthetic note to this perfume, and the clean musc goes amazingly well with it : I feel like I have been forced to meticulously clean myself to appear as fresh and young and conventionally attractive as I can. I am plastic, it's fantastic, but I'm also the moon's daughter and I fucking will swim in a pond and get all muddy to talk to her. Again, WTF Penhaligon's, I just wanted to smell nice.<br />
<br />
(This perfume did a better job than any therapist I ever talked to)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2017099"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2017099#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1581469" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1581469" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="supermama"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1207611"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="supermama" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/Oud-Bouquet-39739.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39739.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Bouquet"title="Oud Bouquet"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1581469ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1581469" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1207611">supermama</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-10">06/10/22 02:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance reminds me of the scene in the lord of the rings, when Frodo and Sam first left Shire and they saw the wood elves walking in the moonlight.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1581469"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1581469#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent838034" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc838034" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cellophane93"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1013274"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1013274.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cellophane93" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Byredo/Sunday-Cologne-13044.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13044.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sunday Cologne"title="Sunday Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma838034ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd838034" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1013274">Cellophane93</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-07-03">07/03/17 13:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At first whiff this is juicy, almost-syrupy, delicious citrus. And then rose. And pine needles. For hours. It's a nice, long-lasting, linear scent, but the fir and juniper I think adds a really intriguing, prickly edge to the typical rose theme. I'm not yet sure whether it suits *me*. I'm a guy, and the rose is quite bright and prominent here. It does conjure up a nice image, though: nighttime, kitschy red roses in a deep, dark forest, soft moonlight filtering down. On the right person, I imagine this mix of dusty petals and spiky, mysterious forest notes could be a stunner.<br />
<br />
Also, the juice is not cream-colored like in the picture here: it's a pale purple, very lunar-like. :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="838034"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=838034#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1714686" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1714686" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Verlyss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1624301"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1624301.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Verlyss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Twilly-d-Hermes-46145.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46145.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Twilly d’Hermès"title="Twilly d’Hermès"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1714686ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1714686" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1624301">Verlyss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-22">12/22/22 00:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The perfume that set me into my perfume journey this year, this was a love at first scent that I impulsively purchased when my friend first tested it at the Escentials perfume shop in KLCC. The moment I smelled it, the song Altar of Dreams by Aspidistrafly began to play in my head I knew I had to have it, being a perfume strong enough to evoke a song on first scent. It feels so fairy-like. <br />
<br />
It's far from a statement type of scent, but rather one ethereal as a mist at moonrise and moonset. There's a soft blanket of refreshing citrus in the opening which I find as comforting as a breeze as one awakes at nightfall, and it dries down to a dreamlike Greek impressionistic, watercolour moonlit rose garden in shades of silver, blue and magenta. Pools of clear water ripple after a light rain, petals float atop it, dewdrops rest atop bushes of roses and jasmine. One traipses barefoot across the stepping stones on the lake, and descends into the lake of silvery moonlight, almost lulled into a slumber by the beauty of the fragrance. <br />
<br />
It also develops beautifully on my skin. The only saddening thing about this fragrance is like what others have said - the longevity is poor for such a steep price, at most 3 hours before it becomes a skin scent. I spray it on my clothes to get at least 5 - 6 hours out of it; on my pillow it would last a whole night. Then again, it is made out of a lot of refreshing accords which are not meant to last long enough. It's good for going to church, having tea with friends or for a date. Not something that would last a whole day. I suppose the dreamlike ethereal quality also extends to its literal longevity - you'll eventually have to wake up from a short-lived, beautiful dream. But after misting my hair quite generously with it, I can catch whiffs of citrusy rosiness the whole day. It also has gotten me quite a few compliments from others after those few generous sprays, that is after several hours have passed since the initial application, whjch means it's still enough to be noticed by others but not enough to be offensive.<br />
<br />
I love it so much that after buying the 30ml bottle and using almost half of it, I bought the 100ml bottle a few months later the moment it was back in stock (and fortunately with a seasonal discount voucher) because there's really no way to obtain this bottle anywhere else in Malaysia other than Escentials KLCC. Penhaligon's doesn't ship directly to Malaysia, and all other methods of shipping are way more expensive. I use it for special occasions and outings, but due to its price point, I do not wear it all the time despite this being the one I consider my signature scent. All my friends who are not into perfume also agree this one is beautiful, and my beau loves this scent on me. <br />
<br />
Easily my top favourite scent only contended by Guerlain's Herba Fresca, which is still are in that "fresh" category, albeit having very different vibes. But Luna officially stays at the top of my list, and I very recently realise it's great layered with another one of my best scents - Coco Mademoiselle Intense, the chypre amber and fresh florals layer amazingly well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1714686"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1714686#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2106880" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2106880" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Isabella Therese"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1337526"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1337526.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Isabella Therese" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Houbigant/Ambre-Rubis-97383.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.97383.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ambre Rubis"title="Ambre Rubis"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2106880ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2106880" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1337526">Isabella Therese</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-28">03/28/24 07:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Luna is one of my fantasy fragrances. I'm a big fan of The Lord of the Rings (books and movies alike) and I blind bought Luna because someone said it made her think of the wood elves from LOTR. I agree. It smells like a wood elf who's walking around in the moonlight (and starlight) in an enchanted forest, specifically fir forest, surrounded by lemon juice. The fir and citrus are dominant, but I also get a slight floral note. There's almost no sweetness here. It's very refreshing, cooling and bright. I wear Luna everytime i watch LOTR now, so it really is a fantasy scent to me. Sometimes I also wear it on really hot summer days since it's so refreshing. It's not the most amazing scent ever, but it makes me happy. It projects pretty well but doesn't have the best longevity, it lasts about 4-5 hours on my skin. 8/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="2106880"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=2106880#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="38351" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>

It's very similar to Diptyque L'eau Dans L'eau which I love...then turns into a weird bitter fresh scent that I can't explain.  I would recommend testing this before purchase to give it time to develop on the skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="849513"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=849513#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent929098" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/189882">spumyland</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-04-03">04/03/18 15:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>LUNA?it can be ... but not nocturnal.This is what you can see during the day! <br />
To my nose this is all lemon, juniper,tonic roses and a touch of bitter orange and jasmine. <br />
All well rounded but constantly sour.<br />
Goes off in traditional clean moss.<br />
<br />
Diurnal and unisex for sure.<br />
<br />
Meh...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="929098"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=929098#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1668068" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1668068" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Itiskimia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1492390"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1492390.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Itiskimia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giardini-Di-Toscana/Bianco-Latte-64757.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64757.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bianco Latte"title="Bianco Latte"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1668068ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1668068" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); It’s quite masculine leaning, I would like this more on a guy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="1668068"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=1668068#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent765324" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc765324" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ScarlettX"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/656487"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.656487.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ScarlettX" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Yellow-Diamond-13064.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13064.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Yellow Diamond"title="Yellow Diamond"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma765324ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd765324" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/656487">ScarlettX</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-11-28">11/28/16 14:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a light and citrusy green fragrance, but has some weird smelling very masculine undertone. This undertone developes with hours and is barely there, but I can sense it.<br />
The fragrance is without sweetness completely. <br />
Something is incredibly odd about it, so I don't like it very well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="38351"comment_id="765324"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html?ccid=765324#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="38351" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="search-reviews"><search-perfume-reviews :perfume_id="38351":random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]"></search-perfume-reviews></div></div><foundation-tabs></foundation-tabs></reviews-wrapper></div><perfume-shortcut-menu :perfume_id="38351" when-hidden="#toptop"></perfume-shortcut-menu><initialize-status-data></initialize-status-data><div class="cell small-12"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_footer -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300 __728x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_footer" v-pre>
</div></div></div>

                if (lang == 'ZH') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.asia").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'NL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.nl").replace(/designers/, "ontwerper").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'SR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.punmiris.com").replace(/designers/, "dizajner").replace(/perfume/, "parfem") });
                if (lang == 'RO') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ro").replace(/designers/, "creatori").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'AR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragranticarabia.com").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'UK') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ua").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'MN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.mn").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'HE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.co.il").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
            });
</script>


<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFFe5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('#fragranticaloader').fadeOut(20);
    });
</script>
</body>
</html>
